trait.name: One-handed Axes
trait.tooltip: Allows the use of One-handed Axes
trait.description: Allows the use of One-handed Axes. Axes have a small chance of reducing the target's armour.

trait.name: One-handed Clubs
trait.tooltip: Allows the use of One-handed Clubs
trait.description: Allows the use of One-handed Clubs. Clubs have a small chance of slowing the target's Attack Speed.

trait.name: One-handed Hammers
trait.tooltip: Allows the use of One-handed Hammers
trait.description: Allows the use of One-handed Hammers. Hammers have a small chance of lowering the target's ability to Evade.

trait.name: One-handed Maces
trait.tooltip: Allows the use of One-handed Maces
trait.description: Allows the use of One-handed Maces. Maces have a small chance of slowing the target's movement speed.

trait.name: One-handed Swords
trait.tooltip: Allows the use of One-handed Swords
trait.description: Allows the use of One-handed Swords. Swords have a small Parry-chance increase.

trait.name: Daggers
trait.tooltip: Allows the use of Daggers
trait.description: Allows the use of Daggers. Daggers have a small chance of landing Critical Hits.

trait.tooltip: Increases maximum power
trait.description: Increases maximum power

trait.tooltip: Increases resistance rating
trait.description: Increases resistance rating

trait.tooltip: Decreases attack duration and increases Finesse
trait.description: Decreases attack duration and increases Finesse

trait.name: Burning Blades
trait.tooltip: When using Burning Blades, all damage skills will do Fire damage.
trait.description: When using Burning Blades, all damage skills will do Fire damage.

trait.name: Enhanced Skill: Jagged Cut
trait.tooltip: Enables your Jagged Cut skill to cause damage over time on your targets.
trait.description: Enables your Jagged Cut skill to cause damage over time on your targets.

trait.name: Enhanced Skill: Glory in Victory
trait.tooltip: When you use Glory in Victory you no longer take additional damage in melee.
trait.description: When you use Glory in Victory you no longer take additional damage in melee.

trait.name: Enhanced Skill: Devastating Strike
trait.tooltip: You can use your Devastating Strike more often.
trait.description: You can use your Devastating Strike more often.

trait.name: Enhanced Skill: Resilience
trait.tooltip: Resilience now provides 5s of CC immunity.
trait.description: Resilience now provides 5s of CC immunity.

trait.name: Enhanced Skill: Against the Odds
trait.tooltip: Against the Odds now provides health and power over time.
trait.description: Against the Odds now provides health and power over time.

trait.name: Enhanced Skill: Blade Toss
trait.tooltip: Blade Toss now slows targets.
trait.description: Blade Toss now slows targets.

trait.name: Fighter Appearance
trait.tooltip: A different visual appearance for your Orc Reaver. A green-skinned Orc wearing a cloth tunic and heavy armour on the left shoulder, left arm, and lower legs. A sword in scabbard is worn on the back.
trait.description: A different visual appearance for your Orc Reaver. A green-skinned Orc wearing a cloth tunic and heavy armour on the left shoulder, left arm, and lower legs. A sword in scabbard is worn on the back.

trait.name: White Hand Fighter Appearance
trait.tooltip: A different visual appearance for your Orc Reaver. A green-skinned Orc wearing a White Hand helm, cloth tunic, and heavy armour on the left shoulder, left arm, and lower legs. A sword in scabbard is worn on the back.
trait.description: A different visual appearance for your Orc Reaver. A green-skinned Orc wearing a White Hand helm, cloth tunic, and heavy armour on the left shoulder, left arm, and lower legs. A sword in scabbard is worn on the back.

trait.name: Charity
trait.description: Charity has its rewards.

trait.name: Compassion
trait.description: Your compassion is one of your greatest strengths.

trait.name: Confidence
trait.description: Your actions have instilled in you a great sense of confidence.

trait.name: Determination
trait.description: Your determination has won you many victories.

trait.name: Discipline
trait.description: The discipline you maintain makes you stronger in the face of danger.

trait.name: Empathy
trait.description: You have a proven empathy for those in need.

trait.name: Fidelity
trait.description: Your fidelity has earned you the respect of those around you.

trait.name: Fortitude
trait.description: Your struggles have built in you tremendous fortitude.

trait.name: Honesty
trait.description: Your honesty has earned you the trust of those around you and the fear of your enemies.

trait.name: Honour
trait.description: Your honour is without peer.

trait.name: Idealism
trait.description: Your idealism can brook no fault.

trait.name: Justice
trait.description: You are a servant of justice.

trait.name: Loyalty
trait.description: Your loyalty shall be rewarded.

trait.name: Mercy
trait.description: You have learned the value of mercy.

trait.name: Patience
trait.description: Patience is a virtue.

trait.name: Innocence
trait.description: Your innocence can be used as a shield.

trait.name: Tolerance
trait.description: Your tolerance of others has taught you to shrug off much.

trait.name: Valour
trait.description: No one can ever question your valour.

trait.name: Wisdom
trait.description: You have found true wisdom.

trait.name: Zeal
trait.description: Your zeal drives you to perfection.

trait.name: Small Size
trait.tooltip: Reduced Might - hobbits lack the physical strength of other races.
trait.description: Reduced Might - hobbits lack the physical strength of other races.

trait.name: Hobbit-toughness
trait.tooltip: Improved Vitality - hobbits are remarkably tough.
trait.description: Improved Vitality - hobbits are remarkably tough.

trait.name: Rapid Recovery
trait.tooltip: Improved out of combat Morale Regeneration - hobbits recover from trying times faster than other races.
trait.description: Improved Morale Regeneration out of combat - hobbits recover from trying times faster than other races.

trait.name: Hobbit-courage
trait.tooltip: Improved Fear Resistance - The slow-kindled courage of the Hobbit Race.
trait.description: Improved Fear Resistance - the slow-kindled courage of the hobbit race.

trait.name: Resist Corruption
trait.tooltip: Improved Shadow Mitigation - hobbits have a great resistance to temptation.
trait.description: Improved Shadow Mitigation - hobbits have a great resistance to temptation.

trait.name: Stoop for a Stone
trait.tooltip: This grants you a short ranged attack.
trait.description: You gain a short-distance ranged attack.

trait.name: Guile and Conviction Bonus
trait.tooltip: Guile and Conviction Fellowship Bonus
trait.description: You receive a bonus to Spider's Guile and Eagle's Cry contributions

trait.description: Hobbit Club-damage Bonus

trait.name: Hobbit-stature
trait.tooltip: You have overcome your humble beginnings and play a mighty role in this age. Your Might is improved.
trait.description: You have overcome your humble beginnings and play a mighty role in this age. Your Might is improved.

trait.name: Return to Michel Delving
trait.tooltip: This enables you to go home to The Shire.
trait.description: This enables you to quickly return to Michel Delving.

trait.name: Return to Rivendell
trait.tooltip: This enables you to go home to Rivendell.
trait.description: This enables you to quickly return to Rivendell.

trait.name: Hobbit-resilience
trait.tooltip: You can raise your own hope value through good old fashioned hobbit cheer.
trait.description: You can raise your Fellowship's Hope value through good old-fashioned hobbit-cheer. This does not stack with other Hope buffs.

trait.name: Hobbit-stealth
trait.tooltip: Although untrained you have the ability to move about unseen, though there is a chance enemies may detect you, especially when moving in front of them.
trait.description: Although untrained, you have the natural ability to move about unseen, though there is a chance enemies may detect you, especially when moving in front of them.

trait.name: Hobbit-silence
trait.tooltip: Prone hobbits are easily ignored when they are thought of as a tasty dinner, causing enemies to ignore you.
trait.description: You can lie prone in complete silence, causing enemies to ignore you.

trait.name: Gift of Men
trait.tooltip: Improved Fate - Men have the greatest destiny of all the Free Peoples.
trait.description: Improved Fate - Men have the greatest destiny of all the Free Peoples.

trait.name: Diminishing of Mankind
trait.tooltip: Decreased Will - Men have weaker wills than the other races.
trait.description: Decreased Will - Men have weaker wills than the other races.

trait.name: Easily Inspired
trait.tooltip: Increased Morale Restoration- Men can be roused to action faster than the other races. (heals heal for more on men)
trait.description: Increased Morale Restoration- Men are more quickly emboldened than the other races.

trait.name: Strong Men
trait.tooltip: Improved Strength - The feats of strength that men such as Boromir could accomplish are worthy of song.
trait.description: Improved Strength - The feats of strength that men such as Boromir could accomplish are worthy of song.

trait.name: Upper-cut
trait.tooltip: You gain a short-distance melee attack.
trait.description: You gain a short-distance melee attack.

trait.tooltip: Tactics and Might Fellowship Bonus
trait.description: You receive a bonus to Stallion's Spirit and Ent's Strength contributions.

trait.description: You are destined to greatness -- a Man for the Fourth Age -- but for now you must secure the Third. Your Will is improved.

trait.tooltip: This enables you to go home to Bree.
trait.description: This enables you to quickly return to Bree.

trait.name: Role: Bannerguard
trait.tooltip: Skirmish Test Tooltip
trait.description:
You train your Soldier to be a Bannerguard. A Bannerguard wields a banner and a weapon and will concentrate on supporting you and your allies.
<rgb=#00FF00>Armour: Heavy</rgb> <rgb=#FF0000>Damage: Medium Melee</rgb> <rgb=#1996FF>Special: Armour Aura</rgb>

trait.name: Role: Herbalist
trait.tooltip: Skirmish Test Tooltip
trait.description:
You train your Soldier to be a Herbalist. A Herbalist cannot attack, but will concentrate on healing you and your allies.
<rgb=#00FF00>Armour: Light</rgb> <rgb=#FF0000>Damage: None</rgb> <rgb=#1996FF>Special: Healing Skill, Healing Aura</rgb>

trait.name: Role: Warrior
trait.tooltip: Skirmish Test Tooltip
trait.description:
You train your Soldier to be a Warrior. A Warrior wields two weapons and will concentrate on defeating your foes, specializing in dealing damage to multiple foes at once.
<rgb=#00FF00>Armour: Medium</rgb> <rgb=#FF0000>Damage: High Melee</rgb> <rgb=#1996FF>Special: Bypass Armour</rgb>

trait.name: Role: Archer
trait.tooltip: Skirmish Test Tooltip
trait.description:
You train your Soldier to be an Archer. An Archer wields a bow and will concentrate on defeating your foes, specializing in killing one foe at a time.
<rgb=#00FF00>Armour: Medium</rgb> <rgb=#FF0000>Damage: High Ranged</rgb> <rgb=#1996FF>Special: Increased Critical Rating</rgb>

trait.name: Role: Sage
trait.tooltip: Skirmish Test Tooltip
trait.description:
You train your Soldier to be a Sage. A Sage will concentrate on defeating your foes, specializing in debuffing foes as he fights.
<rgb=#00FF00>Armour: Light</rgb> <rgb=#FF0000>Damage: High Tactical</rgb> <rgb=#1996FF>Special: Penetrate Resistance</rgb>

trait.name: Role: Protector
trait.tooltip: Skirmish Test Tooltip
trait.description:
You train your Soldier to be a Protector. A Protector will concentrate on drawing the attention of your foes.
<rgb=#00FF00>Armour: Heavy</rgb> <rgb=#FF0000>Damage: Low Melee</rgb> <rgb=#1996FF>Special: Increased Threat, Increase Armour</rgb>

trait.tooltip: Skirmish Test Tooltip
trait.description:
Your Bannerguard's aura increases armour by less, but will also increase evasion and resistances. You may only equip one Ultimate Skill to your Soldier.
<rgb=#1996FF>Buff: Defensive Aura</rgb>

trait.tooltip: Skirmish Test Tooltip

trait.tooltip: Skirmish Test Tooltip
trait.description:
Your Herbalist learns to heal all allies over time. You may only equip one Ultimate Skill to your Soldier.

Your Warrior learns to spin about, slashing nearby foes and leaving them with bleeding wounds. You may only equip one Ultimate Skill to your Soldier.

trait.tooltip: Skirmish Test Tooltip

Your Warrior learns to go berserk, allowing them to penetrate even more armour. You may only equip one Ultimate Skill to your Soldier.

trait.tooltip: Skirmish Test Tooltip

Your Archer learns to fire a shot which opens a painful wound in your foe. You may only equip one Ultimate Skill to your Soldier.

trait.tooltip: Skirmish Test Tooltip

Your Archer learns to focus on their bow, allowing them to land even more critical hits. You may only equip one Ultimate Skill to your Soldier.

trait.name: Ultimate: Word of Flame
trait.tooltip: Skirmish Test Tooltip

Your Sage learns to deal great damage to a single target. You may only equip one Ultimate Skill to your Soldier.
<rgb=#FF0000>Damage: Ultimate Tactical, Fire</rgb>

trait.tooltip: Skirmish Test Tooltip
trait.description:
Your Sage learns to harm a foe and reduces their attack speed. You may only equip one Ultimate Skill to your Soldier.
<rgb=#FF0000>Damage: Medium Tactical, Frost</rgb> <rgb=#ffff00>Debuff: Attack Duration</rgb>

trait.name: Ultimate: Defender of All
trait.tooltip: Skirmish Test Tooltip
trait.description:
Your Protector learns to force all nearby foes to attack them for a short time. You may only equip one Ultimate Skill to your Soldier.

trait.tooltip: Skirmish Test Tooltip
trait.description:

trait.name: Plagued Orc Appearance
trait.tooltip: A different visual appearance for your Orc Reaver. A pale-skinned Moria Orc covered in wounds wearing a leather tunic. The armour is dyed orange.
trait.description: A different visual appearance for your Orc Reaver. A pale-skinned Moria Orc covered in wounds wearing a leather tunic. The armour is dyed orange.

trait.name: Corpulant Orc Appearance
trait.tooltip: A different visual appearance for your Orc Reaver. A dusky-skinned fat Orc wearing a mail-tunic and shoulder-guard. The armour is dyed silver.
trait.description: A different visual appearance for your Orc Reaver. A dusky-skinned fat Orc wearing a mail-tunic and shoulder-guard. The armour is dyed silver.

trait.name: Gangling Orc Appearance
trait.tooltip: A different visual appearance for your Orc Reaver. A dark-skinned Lanky Orc wearing light leather armour and leggings and a mail-tunic. The armour is dyed brown and grey.
trait.description: A different visual appearance for your Orc Reaver. A dark-skinned lanky Orc wearing light leather armour and leggings and a mail-tunic. The armour is dyed brown and grey.

trait.name: Ravening Orc Appearance
trait.tooltip: A different visual appearance for your Orc Reaver. A blue-skinned Moria Orc wearing a leather tunic and a metal shoulder-guard and helm. The armour is dyed orange and brown.
trait.description: A different visual appearance for your Orc Reaver. A blue-skinned Moria Orc wearing a leather tunic and a metal shoulder-guard and helm. The armour is dyed orange and brown.

trait.name: Smouldering Ravening Orc Appearance
trait.tooltip: A different visual appearance for your Orc Reaver. A pale-skinned Moria Orc covered in fiery scars wearing a leather tunic. The armour is dyed orange.
trait.description: A different visual appearance for your Orc Reaver. A pale-skinned Moria Orc covered in fiery scars wearing a leather tunic. The armour is dyed orange.

trait.name: Bull-masked Corpulant Appearance
trait.tooltip: A different visual appearance for your Orc Defiler. A green-skinned Orc with the mark of the White Hand wearing a brown leather tunic and leather strapping on the wrists and ankles.
trait.description: A different visual appearance for your Orc Defiler. A green-skinned Orc with the mark of the White Hand wearing a brown leather tunic and leather strapping on the wrists and ankles.

trait.name: Drake-masked Gangling Appearance
trait.tooltip: A different visual appearance for your Orc Defiler. A pale-skinned Orc wearing light leather armour and leggings and a mail-tunic.
trait.description: A different visual appearance for your Orc Defiler. A pale-skinned Orc wearing light leather armour and leggings and a mail-tunic.

trait.name: Goat-masked Pestilent Appearance
trait.tooltip: A different visual appearance for your Orc Defiler. A pale-skinned Orc with red spots wearing a brown and red leather tunic and corded strapping on wrists and ankles.
trait.description: A different visual appearance for your Orc Defiler. A pale-skinned Orc with red spots wearing a brown and red leather tunic and corded strapping on wrists and ankles.

trait.name: Goat-masked Painted Appearance
trait.tooltip: A different visual appearance for your Orc Defiler. A green-skinned Orc with black painted decoration wearing a blue and brown leather tunic.
trait.description: A different visual appearance for your Orc Defiler. A green-skinned Orc with black painted decoration wearing a blue and brown leather tunic.

trait.name: Aurochs-masked Ravening Appearance
trait.tooltip: A different visual appearance for your Orc Defiler. A blue-skinned Orc wearing a leather tunic and a metal shoulder-guard and helm. The armour is dyed orange and brown.
trait.description: A different visual appearance for your Orc Defiler. A blue-skinned Orc wearing a leather tunic and a metal shoulder-guard and helm. The armour is dyed orange and brown.

trait.name: Black Venom Appearance
trait.tooltip: A different visual appearance for your Spider Weaver.A black spider with a purple, black, and gold-patterned upper abdomen.The legs are black with purple markings. The head is black and purple.
trait.description: A different visual appearance for your Spider Weaver.A black spider with a purple, black, and gold-patterned upper abdomen.The legs are black with purple markings. The head is black and purple.

trait.name: Hairy Stinger Appearance
trait.tooltip: A different visual appearance for your Spider Weaver.A purple, pink, and grey tarantula-esque spider with a red and purple furry, spiked abdomen.The legs also have spikes and fur.The head is pink and purple.
trait.description: A different visual appearance for your Spider Weaver.A purple, pink, and grey tarantula-esque spider with a red and purple furry, spiked abdomen.The legs also have spikes and fur.The head is pink and purple.

trait.name: Vile Spinner Appearance
trait.tooltip: A different visual appearance for your Spider Weaver. An orange, purple, and red spider with a reddish orange spotted upper abdomen.The legs have purple coloured joints and the tips are red.The head is pink with purple spots.
trait.description: A different visual appearance for your Spider Weaver. An orange, purple, and red spider with a reddish orange spotted upper abdomen.The legs have purple coloured joints and the tips are red.The head is pink with purple spots.

trait.name: Shakh-hai Smith Appearance
trait.tooltip: A different visual appearance for your Uruk Blackarrow. A pink-skinned Uruk with a leather smith's apron, gloves, cap and boots.
trait.description: A different visual appearance for your Uruk Blackarrow. A pink-skinned Uruk with a leather smith's apron, gloves, cap and boots.

trait.name: Black Moria Uruk Appearance
trait.tooltip: A different visual appearance for your Uruk Blackarrow. A black, iridescent-skinned Uruk with a green-braided shoulder sash. The Uruk is equipped with a leather tunic and bracers.
trait.description: A different visual appearance for your Uruk Blackarrow. A black, iridescent-skinned Uruk with a green-braided shoulder sash. The Uruk is equipped with a leather tunic and bracers.

trait.name: Blade-arrow Uruk Appearance
trait.tooltip: A different visual appearance for your Uruk Blackarrow. A pale-skinned uruk dressed in a red and brown cloth tunic with leather boots, gloves, and hat. This uruk is equipped with leather shoulder-armour and a belt of blades.
trait.description: A different visual appearance for your Uruk Blackarrow. A pale-skinned Uruk dressed in a red and brown cloth tunic with leather boots, gloves, and hat. This Uruk is equipped with leather shoulder-armour and a belt of blades.

trait.name: Blazing Armoured Uruk Appearance
trait.tooltip: A different visual appearance for your Uruk Warleader. A grey-skinned Uruk wearing a helm and heavy armour on the shoulders, chest, legs, and hands. The armour is molten on the edges.
trait.description: A different visual appearance for your Uruk Warleader. A grey-skinned Uruk wearing a helm and heavy armour on the shoulders, chest, legs, and hands. The armour is molten on the edges.

trait.name: Elite Armoured Uruk Appearance
trait.tooltip: A different visual appearance for your Uruk Warleader. A green-skinned, bald Uruk wearing a helm and heavy armour on the shoulders, chest, legs and hands. The armour is battle-scarred metal in copper and silver.
trait.description: A different visual appearance for your Uruk Warleader. A green-skinned, bald Uruk wearing a helm and heavy armour on the shoulders, chest, legs and hands. The armour is battle-scarred metal in copper and silver.

trait.name: White Hand Uruk Appearance
trait.tooltip: A different visual appearance for your Uruk Warleader. A pale-skinned Uruk wearing a helm and leather armour on the shoulders, chest, hands and feet. The armour is black and red with the White Hand applied to the chest.
trait.description: A different visual appearance for your Uruk Warleader. A pale-skinned Uruk wearing a helm and leather armour on the shoulders, chest, hands and feet. The armour is black and red with the White Hand applied to the chest.

trait.name: Vile Horror Dire Warg Appearance
trait.tooltip: A different visual appearance for your Warg Stalker: a green and brown mutated Warg. Flesh and sinew hold this Warg together with visible bones.
trait.description: A different visual appearance for your Warg Stalker: a green and brown mutated Warg. Flesh and sinew hold this Warg together with visible bones.

trait.name: Bloody-jowled Dire Warg Appearance
trait.tooltip: A different visual appearance for your Warg Stalker: a black and grey mottled Warg with a scratched and bloody muzzle.
trait.description: A different visual appearance for your Warg Stalker: a black and grey mottled Warg with a scratched and bloody muzzle.

trait.name: Brindled Warg Appearance
trait.tooltip: A different visual appearance for your Warg Stalker: a tawny-coloured Warg with black stripes.
trait.description: A different visual appearance for your Warg Stalker: a tawny-coloured Warg with black stripes.

trait.name: Endurance
trait.description: Increases the War-steed's maximum Endurance. Increasing your war-steed's endurance allows it to survive longer in battle.

trait.name: Strength
trait.description: Increases the Strength of the War-steed and the Rider while mounted. An increase in your war-steed's strength will contribute to its combat effectiveness and regeneration of its vitals.

trait.name: Strength
trait.description: Increases the Strength of the War-steed and the Rider while mounted. An increase in your war-steed's strength will contribute to its combat effectiveness and regeneration of its vitals.

trait.name: Strength
trait.description: Increases the Strength of the War-steed and the Rider while mounted. An increase in your war-steed's strength will contribute to its combat effectiveness and regeneration of its vitals.

trait.name: Armour
trait.description: Increases the War-steed's maximum Armour. The war-steed's armour works similarly as armour on the Rider, as it mitigates incoming damage.

trait.name: Endurance
trait.description: Increases the War-steed's maximum Endurance. Increasing your war-steed's endurance allows it to survive longer in battle.

trait.name: Power
trait.description: Increases the War-steed's maximum Power. Increasing your war-steed's power allows the Rider and horse to execute more skills. Your steed's power is slowly drained over time while galloping in combat. With increased power you can push your steed faster and longer during combat.

trait.name: Agility
trait.description: Increases the War-steed's Agility. An increase in your war-steed's agility will contribute to its ability to turn quicker while moving at top speed and contributes to its regeneration vitals.

trait.name: Rush of Energy
trait.description: With a surge of energy, your war-steed finds itself unable to tire in battle.

specialEffect.label: Unlocks the Skill Rush of Energy

trait.name: Fast Manoeuvring
trait.description: Your war-steed is adept at weaving in and out of combat, increasing its chances to evade enemy attacks.

trait.name: Bolstering Cry
trait.description: The bond between rider and war-steed is strong. Upon simply hearing your voice, your horse finds itself with a renewed endurance.

specialEffect.label: Unlocks the skill Bolstering Cry

trait.name: Long Reach
trait.description: You take aim from atop your war-steed, providing greater distance for all of your ranged abilities.

trait.name: Exceptional Tactics
trait.description: Your prowess in mounted combat is unparalleled, allowing your attacks to bypass much of your enemy's defence.

trait.name: Invigorate
trait.description: The bond between rider and war-steed is strong. Through your inspiring actions, you are able to ready your horse for battle once more.

specialEffect.label: Unlocks the skill Invigorate

trait.name: Invigorating Presence
trait.description: You are well-versed in the healing arts and show great skill when healing yourself and others.

trait.name: Vicious Attacks
trait.description: The sight of the enemy drives your war-steed into a violent rage, causing certain attacks to perform additional bleed damage.

specialEffect.label: ${CLASS}: The following skills will apply an additional moderate bleed to the target: ${CLASS:None|Keen Strike and Strategic Strike.[G]|Measured Attack and Oppressive Blow.[C]|Sundering Blow and Destabilizing Strike.[H]|Driving Slash and Rohan's Edge.[U]|Flay Open and Spread of Arrows.[T]|Metal and Mettle and Enduring Embers.[L]|Hammer of the Rohan and Cry of the Eorlingas.[I]|Invoke the Elements and Oration of Embers.[K]|Strike with Power and Clash of Steel and Will.[W]| Slash, Bee Swarm[B]| Strike[R]}

trait.name: Defensive Riding
trait.description: By placing an emphasis on your defence, you are able to use your war-steed to your advantage and increase your chances to block, parry, and evade enemy attacks.

trait.name: Deceptive Appearance
trait.description: The size of your war-steed is misleading, leaving enemies to believe that you can be taken lightly in battle.

trait.name: Bond of Morale
trait.description: The bond between rider and war-steed is one that is not easily broken. While together, you rely on each other's presence to push on through even the bleakest of battles and benefit from an increased morale and endurance regeneration.

trait.name: Feign Injury
trait.description: By making a momentary withdrawal from battle, you are able to re-enter with decreased aggression from the enemy.

specialEffect.label: Unlocks the skill Feign Injury

trait.name: Forceful Blows
trait.description: Empowered by the war-steed beneath you, your attacks possess a greater chance to critically hit and bypass the enemy's armour.

trait.name: Combat Advantage
trait.description: You leverage the speed and strength of your war-steed into your attacks, allowing you to deal more damage with physical and tactical abilities.

trait.name: Tough Exterior
trait.description: Your time riding has left you hardened to the elements, granting a slight resistance to all types of damage.

trait.name: Agility
trait.description: Increases the War-steed's Agility. An increase in your war-steed's agility will contribute to its ability to turn quicker while moving at top speed and contributes to its regeneration vitals.

trait.name: Power
trait.description: Increases the War-steed's maximum Power. Increasing your war-steed's power allows the Rider and horse to execute more skills. Your steed's power is slowly drained over time while galloping in combat. With increased power you can push your steed faster and longer during combat.

trait.name: Hard to Hit
trait.description: Moving as one, you and your steed are both able to evade incoming attacks with greater ease.

trait.name: Armour
trait.description: Increases the War-steed's maximum Armour. The war-steed's armour works similarly as armour on the Rider, as it mitigates incoming damage.

trait.name: Sword and Staff
trait.description: You now may dual wield sword and staff.

stat.name: Inventory_AllowedEquipmentCategories
stat.descriptionOverride: This enables you to use a sword.

specialEffect.label: This allows the dual wielding of weapons.

trait.name: Hard to Hurt
trait.description: Neither you nor your steed are strangers to pain, and your experience makes you harder to hurt while in battle.

trait.name: Physical Specimen
trait.description: You and your steed take pride in your training and being in peak physical condition. Your hard work and dedication result in increased physical mastery.

trait.name: Tactical Genius
trait.description: Your strength lies in your preparation and strategy, leaving you ready for anything while in battle. Your hard work and dedication result in increased tactical mastery.

trait.name: Keen Instincts
trait.description: You have learned to trust your instincts whilst mounted and have become skilled in your ability to parry and block incoming attacks.

trait.name: Rapid Recovery
trait.description: Your steed was trained for lengthy and brutal battles, allowing it to regenerate more endurance while in and out of combat.

trait.name: Deep Reserves
trait.description: Your steed is battle tested and is comfortable pushing itself to the limit, allowing it to recover more power while in and out of combat.

trait.name: Heavy Hand
trait.description: You are in tune with your steed's movements, allowing you to deal greater damage from critical hits.

trait.name: Long Reach
trait.description: Your steed understands the danger of battle and helps you land attacks from a greater distance.

trait.name: Sacrifice
trait.description: You care deeply for your steed and are able to expend power to protect the steed from sustaining any damage for a time.

specialEffect.label: Unlocks the skill Sacrifice

trait.name: Arise
trait.description: Always able to dig deep, you and your steed are able to gain a second wind, instantly recharging fury and power.

specialEffect.label: Unlocks the skill Arise

trait.name: Determination
trait.description: You and your steed share a determination to emerge victorious and your resolve grants increased resistances.

trait.name: Armour
trait.description: Increases the War-steed's maximum Armour. The war-steed's armour works similarly as armour on the Rider, as it mitigates incoming damage.

trait.name: Steel Skin
trait.description: Experience has taught you when a defensive focus is necessary in battle and you have the ability to use your armour to its fullest potential.

specialEffect.label: Unlocks the skill Steel Skin.

trait.name: Benevolence
trait.description: A generous and honourable individual, you enjoy helping those in need, which increases their benevolence towards you.

specialEffect.label: ${CLASS}: While utilizing the Rohirrim Discipline your skills will apply an effect that boosts incoming and outgoing healing: ${CLASS:None|Ride By, Keen Strike, Jollification, All in the Wrist[G]|Cry Havoc, Cry Wrath, Rally the Riders, Rider and Steed[C]|Swift Cut, Sundering Blow, Recuperate, Destabilizing Strike, Horn Blast[H]|Driving Slash, Staggering Slash, Clash of Arms, Rohan's Edge[U]|Flay Open, Seeking Arrow, Noble Arrow, Spread of Arrows[T]|Enduring Embers, Mearas-lore, Bond of the Rider, Sign of Power: Inspiration[L]|Hammer of the Rohirrim, Ballad: Chant, Cry of the Rohirrim, Anthem of the Rohirrim, Coda of the Rohirrim[I]|Fixation of Health, Ameliorating Oration, Debate the People, Resolution of Enduring Life[K]|Roar of the Eorlingas, Assault of the Eorlingas, Strike with Power, Clash of Steel and Will, Defence of the Eorlingas, Skill of the Eorlingas[W]| Slash, Recuperate, Ferocious Roar[B]| Strike, Mocking Taunt, Momentous Hit[R]}

trait.name: Long Reach
trait.description: Your war-steed understands the danger of battle and helps you land attacks from a greater distance.

trait.name: Positive Thinking
trait.description: Your perception is your reality and when you focus on positive results, your morale grows.

specialEffect.label: Unlocks the skill Positive Thinking

trait.name: Agility
trait.description: Increases the War-steed's Agility. An increase in your war-steed's agility will contribute to its ability to turn quicker while moving at top speed and contributes to its regeneration vitals.

trait.name: Cunning
trait.description: Your war-steed's defence is truly unmatched. Both resilient and durable, your steed is able to evade incoming attacks and endure critical hits.

trait.name: Strategist
trait.description: You and your war-steed are the perfect combination of brains and brawn, and your sound strategy gives you an edge against tactical attacks.

trait.name: Endurance
trait.description: Increases the War-steed's maximum Endurance. Increasing your war-steed's endurance allows it to survive longer in battle.

trait.name: Power
trait.description: Increases the War-steed's maximum Power. Increasing your war-steed's power allows the Rider and horse to execute more skills. Your steed's power is slowly drained over time while galloping in combat. With increased power you can push your steed faster and longer during combat.

trait.name: Flexibility
trait.description: You have always believed in limbering up before mounting your war-steed and your experience on horseback has made you adept at blocking and evading attacks while riding.

trait.name: Fearless
trait.description: Never shying away from battle, you and your war-steed are able to withstand physical attacks that would fell a lesser man.

trait.name: Opportunist
trait.description: Ever the opportunist, you know how to target opponents' weaknesses and are able to inflict massive damage when attacking from behind.

trait.name: Precision
trait.description: You are at home while atop your war-steed and you are confident in your attacks. Your precision while mounted makes it difficult for enemies to evade your attacks.

stat.name: Trait_Enemy_EvadeChanceModifier
stat.descriptionOverride: Reduces your targets ability to evade your attacks. Rank 1: -10% Evade Chance Rank 2: -20% Evade Chance Rank 3: -30% Evade Chance

trait.name: Overwhelming Offence
trait.description: Your power is overwhelming and when you attack from horseback, your enemies are hard pressed to block your attacks.

stat.name: Trait_Enemy_BlockChanceModifier
stat.descriptionOverride: Reduces your targets ability to block your attacks. Rank 1: -10% Block Chance Rank 2: -20% Block Chance Rank 3: -30% Block Chance

trait.name: Appearance - Female Rohan Warrior
trait.tooltip: Skirmish Test Tooltip
trait.description: Outfit your Rohirrim Woman in a Rohan Warrior Appearance.

trait.name: Appearance - Male Rohan Warrior
trait.tooltip: Skirmish Test Tooltip
trait.description: Outfit your Rohirrim Man in a Rohan Warrior Appearance.

trait.name: Rapport
trait.description: The bond between rider and steed is strong and your experiences together cannot be matched by your foes. This rapport gives you an advantage against other mounted units.

trait.name: Bond of Power
trait.description: The bond between rider and war-steed is one that is not easily broken. Drawing inspiration from one another, you are able to push back exhaustion and benefit from an increased power regeneration.

trait.name: Mounted Advantage
trait.description: An unmounted enemy is no match for you and your mighty war-steed. Your advantageous position allows you to deal massive damage to these foes.

trait.name: Shields Will Be Splintered
trait.description: You show your enemy no mercy, striking where it hurts most, reducing armour and inflicting bleed damage.

specialEffect.label: ${CLASS}: While utilizing the Red Dawn Discipline the following skills will greatly reduce enemy armour and inflict heavy bleed damage when a critical hit is landed: ${CLASS:None|Ride By, Keen Strike[G]|Cry Havoc, Cry Wrath, Rally the Riders[C]|Swift Cut, Sundering Blow, Destabilizing Strike[H]|Driving Slash, Staggering Slash, Clash of Arms, Rohan's Edge[U]|Flay Open, Seeking Arrow, Noble Arrow, Spread of Arrows[T]|Enduring Embers, Bond of the Rider[L]|Hammer of Rohan, Dirge, Cry of the Eorlingas, Call of the Eorlingas, Coda of the Eorlingas[I]|Fixation of Flame, Oration of Embers, Resolution of Fire[K]|Assault of the Eorlingas, Strike with Power, Clash of Steel and Will, Skill of the Eorlingas[W]|Execute, Biting Edge[B]| Momentous Hit[R]}

trait.name: Instigate
trait.description: You know how to get under your opponents' skin and you are able to draw attention away from your weaker allies.

specialEffect.label: Unlocks the skill Instigate.

trait.name: Well Rounded
trait.description: A well rounded attack is critical to success and you pride yourself on being a force on both offence and defence.

trait.name: Ride for Ruin
trait.description: You fight this battle with all of your strength. Holding nothing back, your attacks have a greater chance to land a critical hit.

specialEffect.label: Unlocks the skill Ride for Ruin.

trait.name: Trample
trait.description: Your war-steed is an unstoppable force, bearing down on unmounted enemies, trampling them and leaving them in the dirt.

specialEffect.label: Unlocks the skill Trample.

trait.name: Conservative Combatant
trait.description: You are skilled at conserving energy and are able to expend less energy when performing certain skills.

specialEffect.label: ${CLASS}: Affects the following skills while utilizing the Riddermark Discipline: ${CLASS:None|Ride By, Keen Strike, Trick: Stratagem, Jollification, Strategic Strike, and All in the Wrist.[G]|Measured Attack, Oppressive Blow, Cry Havoc, Cry Wrath, Rally the Riders, and Rider and Steed.[C]|Mounted Strike, Swift Cut, Sundering Blow, Recuperate, Destabilizing Strike, and Horn Blast.[H]|Driving Slash, Staggering Slash, Serrated Edge, Clash of Arms, Pledge to Rohan, and Rohan's Edge.[U]|Flay Open, Seeking Arrow, Noble Arrow, Spread of Arrows[T]|Metal and Mettle, Enduring Embers, Mearas-lore, Radiant Burst, Bond of the Rider, and Sign of Power: Inspiration.[L]|Hammer of Rohan, Ballad: Saga, Cry of the Eorlingas, Call of the Eorlingas, Anthem of the Riddermark, and Coda of the Eorlingas[I]|Invoke the Elements, Inspirational Verse, Fixation of Storm, Oration of the Bleak Sky, Debate the Land, and Resolution of Storms.[K]|Roar of the Eorlingas, Assault of the Eorlingas, Strike with Power, Clash of Steel and Will, Defence of the Eorlingas, and Skill of the Eorlingas.[W]| Execute, Biting Edge[B]| Momentous Hit and Camaraderie[R]}

trait.name: Dash
trait.description: Your war-steed is able to sustain its short burst of speed for a longer period of time and dash over a longer distance.

specialEffect.label: Unlocks the skill Dash.

trait.name: Race: Rohirrim Female
trait.tooltip: Skirmish Test Tooltip
trait.description: You choose a Rohirrim Woman as your Soldier

trait.name: Race: Rohirrim Male
trait.tooltip: Skirmish Test Tooltip
trait.description: You choose a Rohirrim Man as your Soldier

trait.name: Dash
trait.description: Even when pushed to the limit, your steed is able to dig deep and gain a burst of speed for a short time.

specialEffect.label: Unlocks the skill Dash

trait.name: Quickness
trait.description: Swift and nimble by nature, your war-steed is able to carry the load, allowing you to focus on the task at hand.

specialEffect.label: ${CLASS}: The following skills will enjoy shorter cooldowns: ${CLASS:None|Keen Strike, Trick: Stratagem, All in the Wrist, Strategic Strike, and Jollification.[G]|Cry Havoc, Cry Wrath, Rally the Riders, and Rider is the Steed.[C]|Swift Cut, Sundering Blow, Destabilizing Strike, Recuperate, and Horn Blast.[H]|Serrated Edge, Clash of Arms, Pledge to Rohan, and Rohan's Edge.[U]|Flay Open, Seeking Arrow, Noble Arrow, Spread of Arrows, and Kill Shot.[T]|Mearas-lore, Radiant Burst, Bond of the Rider, and Sign of Power: Inspiration.[L]|Cry of the Eorlingas and Anthem of the Rohirrim/Riddermark/Red Dawn.[I]|Oration and Debate skills.[K]|Strike with Power, Clash of Steel and Will, Defence of the Eorlingas, Skill of the Eorlingas, Shield the Flank, Lancer's Charge, and Halt the Charge.[W]| Recuperate, Ferocious Roar[B]| Mocking Taunt and Take a Breath [R]}

trait.name: Elven Light Armour Halter
trait.description: A tooled leather halter set on silk.

trait.name: Elven Leaf Halter
trait.description: An intricate halter of leaf-patterned fabric and scaled plating.

trait.name: Steed of Night Halter
trait.description: The trademark headgear of the steeds of the Eldgang. The glowing symbols burn brightly even on the darkest of nights.

trait.name: Withywindle Halter
trait.description: A halter of leather and fabric fit for adventuring through the deepest woods.

trait.name: Dagorlad Halter
trait.description: A striking halter made from leather and sturdy chainmail.

trait.name: Bone Halter
trait.description: Mighty was Smaug the Golden. Mighty also is this intimidating headdress, fashioned in the likeness of Smaug's ancient bones.

trait.name: Victory Halter
trait.description: A sleek, studded halter cut from fine leather.

trait.name: Elven Leaf Caparison
trait.description: This fine barding was hand-worked by the master tailors and goldsmiths of Lrien.

trait.name: Elven Wing Halter
trait.description: This splendid halter, made of dark leather and winged accents, boasts the true glory of the Galadhrim.

trait.name: Elven Light Armour Saddle
trait.description: A beautiful saddle crafted with care by Miluidan, master leather-worker of Rivendell.

trait.name: Citadel Accessory
trait.description: The Tower Guards of Minas Tirith use this dependable gear while on patrol beyond the city walls.

trait.name: Esgaroth Halter
trait.description: A halter of plated leather like the ones used by the Men of Dale in the Battle of Five Armies.

trait.name: Bone Caparison
trait.description: These bones rest atop a blanket of ragged silk, and are made in imitation of the ribcage of a fearsome dragon of old.

trait.name: Citadel Saddle
trait.description: A sleek black-and-silver saddle. By day it glistens like silver. By night it is like a shade, allowing steed and rider to pass unseen.

trait.name: Victory Caparison
trait.description: This heavy, plated black leather and crimson caparison will offer both style and protection to any war-steed.

trait.name: Bone Saddle
trait.description: An impressive saddle made of rawhide and carved bone.

trait.name: Bone Leggings
trait.description: The muddy bones of fallen beasts, hollowed of their marrow and fastened to dark leather straps.

trait.name: Elven Wing Leggings
trait.description: Be shown the meaning of haste with these beautiful winged leg-guards, and run as smoothly as a swift stream.

trait.name: Dagorlad Leggings
trait.description: Now for wrath, now for ruin and a red nightfall!

trait.name: Dol Baran Leggings
trait.description: Leggings like these bore the Grey Company and its steeds swiftly over the plains.

trait.name: Esgaroth Leggings
trait.description: Warm and sturdy leg-guards in the signature colours of Lake-town.

trait.name: Steed of Night Accessory
trait.description: Two elegant leather pouches and a slim black bedroll, perfect for short trips.

trait.name: Iron Hills Halter
trait.description: A worn leather halter, carefully crafted to protect the War-steed.

trait.name: Marauder Accessory
trait.description: Weather-worn burlap pouches and sharp but simple axe.

trait.name: Iron Hills Leggings
trait.description: Sturdy Dwarf-make leg guards made for colder weather.

trait.name: Withywindle Saddle
trait.description: A fine leather saddle with elegant gold tooling.

trait.name: Dol Baran Caparison
trait.description: When the Rangers of the Grey Company set out to join their chieftain in the south, they dressed their faithftul steeds in dull but fearsome armour such as this.

trait.name: Esgaroth Tail
trait.description: An intricate leather tail-wrap of traditional Dalish design.

trait.name: Elven Wing Caparison
trait.description: Elegant green barding made for riding beneath the dappled shade of the mellyrn of Lrien.

trait.name: Victory Accessory
trait.description: Sturdy leather saddlebags fit for carrying a variety of gear.

trait.name: Victory Leggings
trait.description: Fashionable but functional leg guards made of fabric and leather.

trait.name: Elven Light Armour Caparison
trait.description: The merry Elves of Rivendell favour this festive barding of red, gold, and green like the trees of their beloved home.

trait.name: Dagorlad Saddle
trait.description: A tough leather saddle made to endure the elements.

trait.name: Withywindle Leggings
trait.description: Light-weight leather leg-guards built for moving swiftly through thick undergrowth.

trait.name: Withywindle Caparison
trait.description: Inspired by the bark and foliage of the Old Forest, this sturdy barding will last through the most taxing of adventures.

trait.name: Steed of Night Saddle
trait.description: A large, sturdy saddle made to provide comfort when riding the harsh terrain of Nrz Ghshu.

trait.name: Steed of Night Caparison
trait.description: The caparisons of the Eldgangs' war-steeds blaze brightly in the ever-looming shadow of Nrz Ghshu.

trait.name: Dagorlad Accessory
trait.description: A sturdy round shield and well-made dwarf-made sword to keep at the ready for unexpected combat.

trait.name: Iron Hills Caparison
trait.description: This thick brown caparison was fashioned by the steady hands of the Dwarves of the Iron Hills.

trait.name: Elven Leaf Saddle
trait.description: A dark leather saddle of Elven-craft, with gold and silver accents.

trait.name: Iron Hills Saddle
trait.description: A sturdy cold-weather saddle bearing the maker's mark of the Iron Hills.

trait.name: Bone Tail
trait.description: A cloth and bone ornament for the tail of a war-steed.

trait.name: Marauder Caparison
trait.description: This hastily assembled armour of mesh and burlap is not made to last, but is still wicked to the eye that beholds it.

trait.name: Esgaroth Saddle
trait.description: A fine Dalish saddle made of burnished red leather.

trait.name: Elven Leaf Leggings
trait.description: Striking teal leg-guards with leaf-patterned gold plate.

trait.name: Esgaroth Caparison
trait.description: The Bowmen of Bard rode to the Battle of Five Armies upon steeds clad in brown and burgundy, and were fearsome to behold.

trait.name: Citadel Halter
trait.description: A halter modelled after those used by the Tower Guard of Minas Tirith.

trait.name: Dol Baran Saddle
trait.description: This saddle is favoured by the Grey Company for its light weight, sturdiness, and simplicity.

trait.name: Marauder Halter
trait.description: A makeshift halter patched together by burlap scraps and wire mesh.

trait.name: Elven Light Armour Leggings
trait.description: Colourful leather leg guards used by the cherished steeds of Rivendell. Light is their footfall in the woods.

trait.name: Steed of Night Leggings
trait.description: Sturdy iron leg-guards accented with leather.

trait.name: Marauder Leggings
trait.description: Studded leather plate strapped to stiff burlap sleeves.

trait.name: Victory Saddle
trait.description: A heavy saddle of black leather reinforced with iron discs.

trait.name: Citadel Leggings
trait.description: Geometric leggings of forged steel, yet black as jet.

trait.name: Dagorlad Caparison
trait.description: Rugged black leather and heavy chainmail made to carry any rider safely through any battle.

trait.name: Dol Baran Halter
trait.description: This jagged leather is sure to intimadate even the mightiest of foes.

trait.name: Elven Wing Saddle
trait.description: A majestic green saddle with a saddlehorn fasioned in the shape of a leaping horse.

trait.name: Marauder Saddle
trait.description: A simple, light saddle of black leather held together by imperfect stitch-work.

trait.name: Citadel Caparison
trait.description: It is said that Beregond of the Minas Tirith Tower Guard decorates his beloved steed in armour much like this.

trait.name: Spears Will Be Shaken
trait.description: Your attacks leave opponents shaken, hobbled and unable to escape your onslaught.

specialEffect.label: ${CLASS}: While utilizing the Red Dawn Discipline the following skills will slow the enemy movement speed when they critically hit: ${CLASS:None|Ride By, Keen Strike[G]|Cry Havoc, Cry Wrath, Rally the Riders[C]|Swift Cut, Sundering Blow, Destabilizing Strike[H]|Driving Slash, Staggering Slash, Rohan's Edge[U]|Flay Open, Seeking Arrow, Noble Arrow, Spread of Arrows[T]|Enduring Embers, Bond of the Rider[L]|Hammer of Rohan, Dirge, Cry of the Eorlingas, Call of the Eorlingas, Coda of the Eorlingas[I]|Fixation of Flame, Oration of Embers, Resolution of Fire[K]|Assault of the Eorlingas, Strike with Power, Clash of Steel and Will, Skill of the Eorlingas[W]|Slash, Bee Swarm, Execute[B]| Momentous Hit[R]}

trait.name: Survivability
trait.description: You will see the sun rise another day

specialEffect.label: ${CLASS}: While utilizing the Rohirrim Discipline there is a chance that the following skills will apply a damage preventing bubble for a short time: ${CLASS:None|Ride By, Keen Strike, Jollification, All in the Wrist[G]|Cry Havoc, Cry Wrath, Rally the Riders, Rider and Steed[C]|Swift Cut, Sundering Blow, Recuperate, Destabilizing Strike, Horn Blast[H]|Driving Slash, Staggering Slash, Clash of Arms, Rohan's Edge[U]|Flay Open, Seeking Arrow, Noble Arrow, Spread of Arrows[T]|Enduring Embers, Mearas-lore, Bond of the Rider, Sign of Power: Inspiration[L]|Hammer of Rohan, Chant, Cry of the Eorlingas, Anthem of the Rohirrim, Coda of the Eorlingas[I]|Fixation of Health, Ameliorating Oration, Debate the People, Resolution of Enduring Life[K]|Roar of the Eorlingas, Assault of the Eorlingas, Strike with Power, Clash of Steel and Will, Defence of the Eorlingas, Skill of the Eorlingas[W]|Slash, Ferocious Roar, Recuperate[B]| Strike, Mocking Taunt, Momentous Hit[R]}

trait.name: Wrath
trait.description: Even in the face of insurmountable odds, you fight with a ferocity never before seen by your foes.

specialEffect.label: ${CLASS}: While utilizing the Red Dawn Discipline the following skills will be 15% more likely to critically hit: ${CLASS:None|Ride By, Keen Strike[G]|Cry Havoc, Cry Wrath, Rally the Riders[C]|Swift Cut, Sundering Blow, Destabilizing Strike[H]|Driving Slash, Staggering Slash, Clash of Arms, Rohan's Edge[U]|Flay Open, Seeking Arrow, Noble Arrow, Spread of Arrows[T]|Enduring Embers, Bond of the Rider[L]|Hammer of Rohan, Dirge, Cry of the Eorlingas, Call of the Eorlingas, Coda of the Eorlingas[I]|Fixation of Flame, Oration of Embers, Resolution of Fire[K]|Assault of the Eorlingas, Strike with Power, Clash of Steel and Will, Skill of the Eorlingas[W]| Slash, Bee Swarm, Execute[B]| Strike, Throw, Reckless Attack, Mocking Taunt, Momentous Hit[R]}

trait.name: Motivation through Aggression
trait.description: The effects of your critical hits inspire those around you, giving them the motivation needed to continue the fight.

specialEffect.label: ${CLASS}: While utilizing the Rohirrim Discipline the following skills have chance to restore 10% of Morale and 10% of Steed Endurance to you and your fellowship (within 40m): ${CLASS:None|Ride By, Keen Strike, Jollification, All in the Wrist[G]|Cry Havoc, Cry Wrath, Rally the Riders, Rider and Steed[C]|Swift Cut, Sundering Blow, Recuperate, Destabilizing Strike, Horn Blast[H]|Driving Slash, Staggering Slash, Clash of Arms, Rohan's Edge[U]|Flay Open, Seeking Arrow, Noble Arrow, Spread of Arrows[T]|Enduring Embers, Mearas-lore, Bond of the Rider, Sign of Power: Inspiration[L]|Hammer of the Rohirrim, Ballad: Chant, Cry of the Rohirrim, Anthem of the Rohirrim, Coda of the Rohirrim[I]|Fixation of Health, Ameliorating Oration, Debate the People, Resolution of Enduring Life[K]|Roar of the Eorlingas, Assault of the Eorlingas, Strike with Power, Clash of Steel and Will, Defence of the Eorlingas, Skill of the Eorlingas[W]| Slash, Recuperate, Ferocious Roar[B]| Strike, Mocking Taunt, Take a Breath[R]}

trait.name: Disengaging Strikes
trait.description: Your critical hits strike with such precision as to catch your enemy off-guard, providing a chance to dismount them instantly.

specialEffect.label: ${CLASS}: While utilizing the Riddermark Discipline the following skills have a 25% chance to instantly dismount the target when they critically hit: ${CLASS:None|Ride By, Keen Strike[G]|Cry Havoc, Cry Wrath[C]|Swift Cut, Destabilizing Strike, Horn Blast[H]|Driving Slash, Staggering Slash, Rohan's Edge[U]|Flay Open, Noble Arrow, Spread of Arrows[T]|Enduring Embers, Bond of the Rider[L]|Hammer of Rohan, Cry of the Eorlingas, Coda of the Eorlingas[I]|Fixation of Storm, Oration of the Bleak Sky, Resolution of Storms[K]|Assault of the Eorlingas, Clash of Steel and Will, Skill of the Eorlingas[W]| Biting Edge, Execute[B]| Momentous Hit[R]}

trait.name: Intimidate
trait.description: You are able to intimidate your opponent, striking fear into their heart so that they flee in terror.

specialEffect.label: Unlocks the skill Intimidate.

trait.name: Coax
trait.description: You are able to get inside your opponent's head and coax mounted enemies into riding alongside of you, engaging in close quarters combat.

specialEffect.label: Unlocks the skill Coax.

trait.name: Dash
trait.description: As a result of constant conditioning your war-steed is very slow to tire. Its Dash skill becomes a toggle and is able to remain active so long as your war-steed has enough power.

specialEffect.label: Unlocks the skill Dash

trait.name: Strong Willed
trait.description: You are able to dig deep when necessary, allowing your effects a longer duration or greater chance of success.

specialEffect.label: ${CLASS}: While utilizing the Riddermark Discipline: ${CLASS:None|Ride By and All in the Wrist will last an additional 7 seconds.[G]|Measured Attack, Oppressive Blow, Cry Havoc, and Rider and Steed will last an additional 7 seconds. Rally the Riders will gain an additional pulse.[C]|Recuperate, Destabilizing Strike, Horn Blast and Swift Cut will last an additional 7 seconds (does not extend bleed damage).[H]|Driving Slash, Staggering Slash, and Clash of Arms will last an additional 7 seconds.[U]|Flay Open and Spread of Arrows will last an additional 7 seconds. Seeking Arrow is 20% more likely to dismount the target.[T]|Mearas-lore will last an additional 7 seconds. Enduring Embers is granted an additional pulse.[L]|Anthem of the Riddermark and Cry of the Eorlingas will last an additional 7 seconds. Hammer of Rohan is granted an additional pulse. [I]|Fixation of Storm, Oration of the Bleak Sky, Debate the Land, and Resolution of Storms will last an additional 7 seconds [K]|Defence of the Eorlingas will last an additional 7 seconds and Halt the Charge will last an additional 7 seconds regardless of Discipline. Strike with Power is 20% more likely to dismount the target.[W]|Execute and Recuperate buffs will last an additional 7 seconds. [B]| Overextended and Camaraderie will last an additional 7 seconds.[R]}

trait.name: Caution
trait.description: Your ferocity in battle keeps your enemies at bay, leaving them unsure as to whether they should fight or flee.

specialEffect.label: Unlocks the skill Caution

trait.name: War-steed Riding
trait.tooltip: You are able to ride war-steeds.
trait.description: You are able to ride war-steeds.

trait.name: Deadly Pursuit
trait.description: While pursuing an enemy, you have the ability to find the weakness in their armour and execute attacks that apply bleed damage.

specialEffect.label: All class skills that deal damage will apply a moderate bleed effect when attacking from behind

trait.name: Savagery
trait.description: You are able to tap into your less refined side and attack with devastating force, multiplying the damage done by critical attacks.

trait.name: Battle Tested
trait.description: No stranger to the field of battle, your war-steed fights like it feels no pain, allowing it to recover quickly while in combat.

trait.name: Rehabilitation
trait.description: War is a means to an end, but your steed finds peace when the battle is done, allowing it to recover quickly outside of combat.

trait.name: Determination
trait.description: You and your war-steed share a determination to emerge victorious and your resolve grants increased resistances.

trait.name: Patience
trait.description: You understand that most battles cannot be won quickly and you are able to conserve your energy when performing physical skills.

stat.name: Trait_Class_Skill_Physical_Power_Cost
stat.descriptionOverride: ${CLASS}: Rank 1: -10% Power Cost Rank 2: -20% Power Cost: ${CLASS:None|Ride By, Keen Strike, Strategic Strike, All in the Wrist[G]|Measured Attack, Oppressive Blow[C]|Mounted Strike, Swift Cut, Sundering Blow, Destabilizing Strike[H]|Driving Slash, Staggering Slash, Serrated Edge, Clash of Arms, Rohan's Edge[U]|Flay Open, Establishing Shot, Seeking Arrow, Noble Arrow, Spread of Arrows, Kill Shot[T]|Metal and Mettle[L]|Hammer of the Rohan[I]|None[K]|Assault of the Eorlingas, Strike with Power, Clash of Steel and Will, Defence of the Eorlingas, Skill of the Eorlingas, Shield the Flank, Lancer's Charge, Halt the Charge[W]|Slash, Execute, Biting Edge[B]}

trait.name: Understanding
trait.description: Your steed understands when you choose to attack from a distance and remains steady, allowing you to perform tactical skills with less effort.

stat.name: Trait_Class_Skill_Tactical_Power_Cost
stat.descriptionOverride: ${CLASS}: Rank 1: -10% Power Cost Rank 2: -20% Power Cost: ${CLASS:None|Trick: Stratagem, Jollification[G]|Cry Wrath, Cry Havoc, Rally the Riders (Red Dawn), Rider is the Steed (Red Dawn)[C]|Horn Blast[H]|Pledge to Rohan[U]|None[T]|Enduring Embers, Mearas-lore, Radiant Burst, Bond of the Rider, Sign of Power: Inspiration[L]|Saga, Dirge, Cry of the Eorlingas, Call of the Eorlingas (Red Dawn), Coda of the Eorlingas (Riddermark and Red Dawn)[I]|Invoke the Elements, Fixation of Storm, Fixation of Flame, Oration of the Bleak Sky, Oration of Embers, Debate the Land, Debate Wrath, Resolution of Storms, Resolution of Fire[K]|Roar of the Eorlingas[W]|Bee Swarm, Ferocious Roar, Recuperate[B]}
