trait.name: Rune-keeper's Leggings
trait.description: The Rune-keeper's flight into battle is a prelude to hope for all those who cannot fight. These runed leg-guards guide a steed easily toward the foe.

trait.name: Metal Braided Tail
trait.description: Dusky purple ribbon held in place by sturdy iron bolts.

trait.name: Heavy Accessory of the Sutcrofts
trait.description: These bold and festive saddlebags will leave no mystery about where your loyalties lie.

trait.name: Heavy Leggings of the Entwash
trait.description: These flared leg guards add visual balance to the traditional battle-gear of Eaworth's steeds.

trait.name: Heavy Halter of the Sutcrofts
trait.description: A sturdy, highly-decorated saddle of thick leather used by the vigilant guards of the Sutcrofts.

trait.name: Maverick's Accessory
trait.description: The favoured trappings of the lone dissenter, he who sees the King's descent into dotage, and is not afraid to rebel against the wicked whisperings of Grma Wormtongue.

trait.name: Khundolar Halter
trait.description: A fierce eastern-make battle halter of tough leather beneath engraved silver plates.

trait.name: Light Leggings of the Sutcrofts
trait.description: These simple leg-guards help to keep a steed's legs free of mud when working the fields after recent rain.

trait.name: Lore-master's Saddle
trait.description: Perched high in her broad saddle, the Lore-master is a beacon of hope to those who have lost it. Her knowledge of the past gives rise to a better future.

trait.name: Gatherer's Accessory
trait.description: A useful gear set for anyone who makes a living by gathering the natural bounty of Middle-earth.

trait.name: Hunter's Gear
trait.description: The Hunter's art is one of simple harmony with nature. Hunters carry only what they need to survive in the wild.

trait.name: Heavy Caparison of the Norcrofts
trait.description: When the Men of the Norcrofts are called to war, they dress their beloved steeds in decorative barding made for both strength and speed.

trait.name: Light Saddle of the Sutcrofts
trait.description: A simple saddle, well-worn by years of use in the fields of the Eastemnet.

trait.name: Heavy Accessory of the Entwash
trait.description: A heavy accessory from the people of the Entwash.

trait.name: Heavy Halter of the Entwash
trait.description: A heavy halter from the people of the Entwash.

trait.name: Warrior's Accessory
trait.description: Mercenaries know the importance of being able to travel at a moment's notice. Their rough and simple belongings are all that is needed to earn a living by the sword.

trait.name: Rohirrim Elite Caparison
trait.description: The riders of Rohan thunder across the grassy seas of their homeland in silver and green. This caparison bears the image of a rampant white horse.

trait.name: Light Halter of the Wold
trait.description: This colourful cloth halter will protect your steed's face from the dusty winds of the Wold.

trait.name: Obsidian Halter
trait.description: A fierce, heavy halter made of jagged leather and accented with veins of silver.

trait.name: Rohirrim Elite Saddle
trait.description: A fine leather saddle accented with silver filigree, used by the famed Riders of Rohan as they patrol the bounds of their beloved home.

trait.name: Light Leggings of the Entwash
trait.description: These tough leg guards are meant for pushing aside the reeds and rushes that grow thickly in the Entwash marshes.

trait.name: Nightwood Halter
trait.description: A well-stitched, full halter made of coloured silk.

trait.name: Light Saddle of the Norcrofts
trait.description: A light-weight and versatile leather saddle common in the Norcrofts.

trait.name: Burglar's Leggings
trait.description: When a practical joke goes sour, a speedy getaway becomes necessary. These leather leg guards help a steed to fly to safety.

trait.name: Medium Banded Leather Halter
trait.description: A ceremonial halter of cloth and studded leather, often used by the Rohirrim to celebrate the end of a battle.

trait.name: Medium Banded Leather Saddle
trait.description: An intricate, ceremonial saddle formed from black leather, traditional in Rohirric celebrations.

trait.name: Light Halter of the Norcrofts
trait.description: This halter is mostly used to show the heraldry of Cliving, but it affords the steed who wears it some protection, as well.

trait.name: Rhn Halter
trait.description: A stark hauberk decorated with traditional Easterling needlework.

trait.name: Champion's Gear
trait.description: True heroics do not stem from battle acuity only, but also preparedness. Extra armour, blades, and rations can often make the difference between a failure and a legend.

trait.name: Rhn Saddle
trait.description: An elegant, high-backed saddled made in the likeness of an exotic bird.

trait.name: Champion's Halter
trait.description: Many depend upon the Champion, who must fight on even through the red haze of battle. The Champion's steed, too, must be prepared to cut through the enemy defences.

trait.name: Obsidian Saddle
trait.description: An intricate patterned saddle fashioned after the work of Dunlending weavers.

trait.name: Heavy Halter of the Norcrofts
trait.description: A fancy, elegant halter used by Norcrofts soldiers when they go into battle.

trait.name: Nightwood Saddle
trait.description: A striking saddle made of bright silk stitched onto formed black leather.

trait.name: Burglar's Saddle
trait.description: Mounted combat can be touch and go at times, especially for those who favour knives. A flat, simple saddle allows for maximum manoeuvrability.

trait.name: Light Halter of the Sutcrofts
trait.description: A simple, dependable halter built for working horses.

trait.name: Rune-keeper's Gear
trait.description: A Rune-keeper's chilling rhetoric is expertly crafted from the secrets found in ancient tomes and stone tablets. Everything the Rune-keeper needs for victory must be kept close at hand.

trait.name: Grand Accessory
trait.description: An ornate and striking pair of saddlebags meant more for making a statement than for functionality. Inspired by the bold, patterned fabrics woven in the faraway land of Rhn.

trait.name: Rune-keeper's Caparison
trait.description: The essence of winter is woven into this striking caparison, threaded with veins of cold silver.

trait.name: Heavy Halter of the Wold
trait.description: The people of the Wold are Rohan's noble bulwark, forever keeping vigil against threats from across the Anduin.

trait.name: Khundolar Saddle
trait.description: A sleek, high-backed saddle made of silk stretched over formed leather.

trait.name: Guardian's Leggings
trait.description: A mighty charge can overpower even the doughtiest of foes. These black leather leggings are near impervious to wear.

trait.name: Merchant's Accessory
trait.description: These roomy saddlebags are of southern-make, and must have been claimed from a merchant caravan travelling north from Harad. They still smell of tea and spices.

trait.name: Burglar's Caparison
trait.description: This dark and mottled barding blends effortlessly into shadow, allowing Burglar and steed to hide in plain sight.

trait.name: Light Saddle of the Wold
trait.description: Light, comfortable saddles like this one are necessary for traversing the harsh and unpredictable terrain of the Wold.

trait.name: Light Leggings of the Wold
trait.description: When riding over the rocky, pockmarked hills of the Wold, it is essential to clothe your steed in durable leg-guards that will not snag on rock or thorn.

trait.name: Accessory of the Northstar
trait.description: It was Elbereth Gilthoniel who kindled the stars into being. Now a master craftsman has embroidered that starlight into these elegant saddlebags, that they might guide you wherever you go.

trait.name: Lore-master's Halter
trait.description: Lore-masters understand well the power of knowledge, and use it to expertly shield their beloved steeds from the elements.

trait.name: Rune-keeper's Halter
trait.description: The Rune-keeper's fiery ridicule is mirrored in this striking silver-edged halter, as neither steed nore rider feels sympathy for their twisted foe.

trait.name: Rhn Caparison
trait.description: A bold Easterling caparison set over sturdy black leather straps and embroidered with fine gold needlework.

trait.name: Guardian's Gear
trait.description: The Guardian carries only the essentialsthose items that may help turn the tables in a seemingly impossible battle.

trait.name: Light Caparison of the Norcrofts
trait.description: Sometimes, defence must be sacrificed for agility. This light-weight tack won't protect the steed from harm, but it will allow it to fly across the plains.

trait.name: Medium Banded Leather Caparison
trait.description: Black leather straps decorated with molded iron roses and set beneath a trailing. Embroidered saddle blanket.

trait.name: Light Halter of the Entwash
trait.description: Cold and unsentimental winds blow across the faded grasses and lonely downs of the Entwash Vale. Practical leather halters like this help to protect a steed from the elements.

trait.name: Heavy Leggings of the Wold
trait.description: Heavy leggings from the people of the Wold

trait.name: Accessory of the Merchant
trait.description: A number of sturdy bags with multiple compartments made to hold a travelling merchant's extensive inventory.

trait.name: Nightwood Caparison
trait.description: A fancy full-body caparison made of intricately embroidered silk.

trait.name: Lore-master's Gear
trait.description: A Lore-master studies ancient craft to better understand the past. Tomes, scrolls, and maps from elder days help her to find success in the present ones.

trait.name: Heavy Caparison of the Entwash
trait.description: In his days as a captain in the King's guard, Ingbert and his steed rode to battle in magnificent armour like this. The full-body caparison bears the clean lines of a lyre, the symbol of Reeve Ingbert's house.

trait.name: Greenwood Saddle
trait.description: Though the Greenwood is now twisted by shadow and by spite, the art of the Elves who loved it persists. This elegant, tooled leather saddle is a reminder of fair days long ago.

trait.name: Obsidian Caparison
trait.description: A striking, heavy-duty caparison made of silver-embroidered tapestry and sleek, shaped leather.

trait.name: Vagabond's Accessory
trait.description: To some, the road is a place between where you are and where you must go; to others, the road is home. This versatile gear set is made for a simple, easy life in the saddle.

trait.name: Heavy Leggings of the Norcrofts
trait.description: Behold the thunderous hoofbeats of your steed as you ride together over the weathered rock and withered grass.

trait.name: Lore-master's Leggings
trait.description: The silver stars upon these leggings flash brightly as the Lore-master's steed runs like a gust of wind toward new discoveries.

trait.name: Rohirrim Elite Tail
trait.description: A durable green-and-gold metal plate made to hold a steed's tail neatly in place as he makes haste through the oceans of grass

trait.name: Rune-keeper's Saddle
trait.description: The vivid imagery of defeat is but an illusion to the Rune-keeper, secure in this high-backed wooden saddle and protected by crystal wards.

trait.name: Khundolar Caparison
trait.description: A magnificent eastern-make caparison and delicately embroidered, quilted saddle blanket. Silver coins are strung from the engraved plates to bring good fortune to the warrior.

trait.name: Burglar's Halter
trait.description: The Burglar's advantage is rooted in stealth, so much so that even his beloved steed must be cloaked in mystery as well.

trait.name: Heavy Accessory of the Norcrofts
trait.description: A gaily-coloured pair of saddlebags bearing the lyre, the symbol of Reeve Ingbert's house.

trait.name: Heavy Saddle of the Wold
trait.description: The wide and featureless face of the Wold makes for a long patrol. A comfortable saddle makes a world of difference.

trait.name: Rohirrim Elite Leggings
trait.description: As steed and rider fly to meet their foe, these green metal leg guards will cut through any brush that stands in their way.

trait.name: Obsidian Tail
trait.description: Formed leather is tough to come by, but not with this tail accessory.

trait.name: Heavy Accessory
trait.description: Four strong, doeskin saddlebags that won't slip off during strenuous travel, and will keep gear dry through any downpour.

trait.name: Guardian's Halter
trait.description: A practical halter of tough, cured leather and durable steel rings to keep a steed safe in the thrill of danger.

trait.name: Torchbearer's Accessory
trait.description: The Beacons of Gondor must be watched day and night, lest the need for aid from Gondor's territories arise. Those Men who watch the beacons know the importance of their task, and must be ready to kindle the flames at a moment's notice.

trait.name: Heavy Saddle of the Entwash
trait.description: A beautiful, fur-lined saddle made by the people of the Entwash Vale. Though fancier than usual, it has not lost its practical feel.

trait.name: Lore-master's Caparison
trait.description: The Lore-master dresses her steed in this starry pattern to invoke the favour of Elbereth, Star-kindler, in hopes that her cry to the Valar might be answered when she is in need.

trait.name: Champion's Leggings
trait.description: A Champion in battle-frenzy must press ever forward, deeper into the heart of battle. These Damascus leg guards help the Champion's steed carry him there.

trait.name: Accessory of the Easterlings
trait.description: Two exotic saddlebags hung with bright orange tassels, and lined with the fur of a predatory cat.

trait.name: Burglar's Gear
trait.description: Quick-fingered Burglars get themselves into a great deal of mischief, and need lots of places to store their liberated treasures.

trait.name: Greenwood Leggings
trait.description: Contoured leather leg guards like these once helped the Elves of the Greenwood to patrol their borders with efficiency and silence.

trait.name: Champion's Caparison
trait.description: A Champion stands adamant even in the face of defeat. This fierce Damascus plate mail will keep the Champion's steed safe to the last.

trait.name: Light Caparison of the Entwash
trait.description: This simple cloth caparison depicts a gilded harp, much like the one carried by the exiled minstrel Horn, son of Reeve Ingbert of Eaworth.

trait.name: Greenwood Caparison
trait.description: Mirkwood was known as Greenwood the Great, Thranduil's archers rode through the verdant wood on steeds dressed in the gentle colours of spring.

trait.name: Light Caparison of the Wold
trait.description: Through brake and bramble, fen and tussock, the steeds of the Wold carry their masters safely home.

trait.name: Dwarf-made Accessory
trait.description: These reliable suede saddlebags are double-stitched and built to last. The tough black boots are helpful for times when you must ford marshy terrain on foot.

trait.name: Heavy Saddle of the Sutcrofts
trait.description: A sturdy, highly-decorated saddle of thick leather used by the vigilant guards of the Sutcrofts.

trait.name: Heavy Caparison of the Wold
trait.description: The Men of the Wold see themselves as all that stands between Rohan and her doom. They proudly display their heraldry when they ride to meet any foe of Rohan.

trait.name: Heavy Saddle of the Norcrofts
trait.description: A high-backed, regulation saddle used by the soldiers of the Norcrofts.

trait.name: Light Leggings of the Norcrofts
trait.description: Simple, understated cloth leg-guards fashioned by the tailors of the Norcrofts.

trait.name: Long Metallic Tail
trait.description: Shining silver scales that fit snugly on a war-steed's tail.

trait.name: Braided Flower Tail
trait.description: Hammered metal flowers and shining purple ribbons that will keep your war-steed's tail stylish and clean.

trait.name: Short Metallic Tail
trait.description: Sturdy iron ornaments of dwarf-make that won't come loose even in the heat of battle.

trait.name: Khundolar Leggings
trait.description: Quilted, embroidered leg guards made to provide support without adding weight.

trait.name: Heavy Caparison of the Sutcrofts
trait.description: The guards who protect Garsfeld, Snowbourn and Walstow bear this heraldry proudly as they ride their bounds.

trait.name: Short Fluffed Tail
trait.description: A tight gold wrapping accented with leather strips, perfect for keeping shorter tails clean.

trait.name: Light Saddle of the Entwash
trait.description: The Entwash Vale is a stark and lonely land, and its people are practical. This basic leather saddle does everything it needs to, and nothing more.

trait.name: Heavy Accessory of the Wold
trait.description: A heavy accessory from the people of the Wold

trait.name: Woven Leather Tail
trait.description: A brightly-coloured tail wrap made of red satin ribbon and gold beads.

trait.name: Short Armoured Tail
trait.description: A striking tail ornament of gilded leather.

trait.name: Obsidian Leggings
trait.description: Simple, functional leg-guards built to protect a steed's sensitive shins.

trait.name: Champion's Saddle
trait.description: From high in this gilded metal saddle, the Champion rains feral strikes down upon the foe to carve a path to victory.

trait.name: Guardian's Caparison
trait.description: Strong is the warrior's heart, and so too is his armour. This shielded leather barding is made to last.

trait.name: Diamond Banded Tail
trait.description: Three diamond-shaped golden plates that look best on long, elegant tails.

trait.name: Rohirrim Elite Halter
trait.description: This impenetrable halter is made of dyed metal plate and rough green fabric. The steeds ridden by the Third Marshall's men wear halters like these.

trait.name: Nightwood Leggings
trait.description: Sturdy leather leg guards accented with colourful silk.

trait.name: Turtle Shield Tail
trait.description: A sturdy tail ornament with a turtle motif, inspired by Dunlending craft.

trait.name: Royal Accessory
trait.description: For some, it is not enough to travel simply. Wealth that is had should be flaunted. These gilded, opulent saddlebags do just that.

trait.name: Shielded Tail
trait.description: Heavy metal ornaments designed to keep a tail hanging low and straight.

trait.name: Guardian's Saddle
trait.description: A dependable leather saddle is all the Guardian needs to catch a breath amidst a fight.

trait.name: Medium Banded Leather Leggings
trait.description: Embroidered cloth leggings made for celebratory parades through the towns of the Estemnet.

trait.name: Leather Wrapped Tail
trait.description: Decorated formed leather that fits snugly on your war-steed's tail.

trait.name: Heavy Leggings of the Sutcrofts
trait.description: The guards of Sutcrofts spare no details when outfitting their steeds for protection.

trait.name: Greenwood Halter
trait.description: Thranduil's archers once favoured armour in the colours of a newborn forest, and clothed their steeds in these as well.

trait.name: Rhn Leggings
trait.description: Ceremonial, embroidered leggings used by Khundolar warriors to decorate their steeds.

trait.name: Light Caparison of the Sutcrofts
trait.description: The crofters of Rohan use sturdy, functional tack when outfitting the horses that join them every day in the wide fields.

trait.name: Accessory Bins
trait.description: Two slender saddlebags perfect for holding an assortment of travel accessories.

trait.name: Axeman's Accessory
trait.description: Style and power combined into one efficient set of travel gear for warriors who cannot afford excess.

trait.name: Traveller's Accessory
trait.description: A simple set of saddlebags built for carrying only the essentials, meant for swift and urgent travel over long distances.

trait.name: Antlers Accessory
trait.description: The solitary Eglain make use of whatever materials they can find. These rough saddlebags of antler and rawhide are an example of their resourcefulness.

trait.name: Assassin's Accessory
trait.description: This versatile assassin's set includes everything one needs to get the job done quickly and quietly. It is favoured by the shadowed figures who lurk in the corners of the Prancing Pony.

trait.name: Solid War-steed
trait.description: A single-coloured pelt free of any distinct markings.

trait.name: Overo War-steed
trait.description: Overo is a term for a pinto coloured horse with distinct, irregular white-over-dark patterning on its hide. The darker patches can occur in any solid base colour.

trait.name: Bay War-steed
trait.description: A bay is characterized by black points on the legs, mane and tail. It is a base colour from which many other variations spring.

trait.name: Tobiano War-steed
trait.description: A common spotted colour pattern common in pintos. The skin underneath the white-haired patches is pink in colour. Tobiano pelts are common, and do not fade as a horse ages.

trait.name: Brindle War-steed
trait.description: An incredibly rare horse colouring. It occurs when a horse or pony possesses both a dark base colour and a lighter shade on top of it, which gives the appearance of stripes on the neck, back, and hindquarters.

trait.name: Shaggy Roan War-steed
trait.description: A roan is any horse that has an even mix of dark and white hairs growing on its pelt. The lower legs, mane, and tail are usually darker in colour. Roan is a common coat colour, and can be found in many breeds.

trait.name: Dappled War-steed
trait.description: Dappled horses are covered in light spots that bring to mind mottled sunlight falling through a leafy canopy.

trait.name: Spotted War-steed
trait.description: This spotted pelt is an Appaloosa variation that results from white being overlaid on top of base coat colours. It is a very old colouration, and occurs in many breeds.

trait.name: Fleabitten War-steed
trait.description: A fleabitten coat is a speckled pattern, usually light in colour, that occurs as a horse ages. It occurs when red-coloured hairs begin to grow on the horse's pelt, often in great abundance.

trait.name: Hunter's Saddle
trait.description: A rustic saddle of wood and leather like this allows the Hunter to stay connected to the strength of the earth.

trait.name: Minstrel's Gear
trait.description: A set of simple instruments lute, drum, bagpipes, and tambourine that the Minstrel may use to raise the spirits even in the thick of battle.

trait.name: Warden's Halter
trait.description: This fine plate-and-tassel regalia suits the Warden, for whom battle is not a duty but a celebration of skill.

trait.name: Survivalist's Accessory
trait.description: The wild places of Middle-earth are treacherous to the unprepared. The survivalist anticipates every need.

trait.name: Red Guard Elite Leggings
trait.description: Sturdy metal leg guards dyed a dark burgundy.

trait.name: Minstrel's Saddle
trait.description: When it comes time to sound the anthem of war, the minstrel chooses a sturdy saddle of silver and gold to carry her into battle.

trait.name: Red Guard Elite Caparison
trait.description: A wine-red, formal caparison emblazoned with the bold Rohan sun.

trait.name: Hunter's Caparison
trait.description: This oiled cloth caparison, covered by a warn bearskin, helps to camouflage the Hunter's steed in the deep woods.

trait.name: Warden's Caparison
trait.description: In battle the Warden is a wall of steel, and so too should be his steed. This strong plate mail provides a war-steed with weight and force enough to topple any foe.

trait.name: Warden's Gear
trait.description: A store of essentials, such as cookware, a repair kit, and a spare shield, helps the Warden to persevere through hardship, expected or otherwise.

trait.name: Captain's Saddle
trait.description: All good Captains must be able to command respect on the battle-field. This high, heavy metal saddle ensures a clear view of the field.

trait.name: Captain's Leggings
trait.description: An escape from darkness requires uncompromised speed. These light-weight metal guards will not slow the Captain's rushing steed.

trait.name: Hunter's Leggings
trait.description: When desperate flight is necessary, these fur-lined leather leggings will not snag on treacherous roots or thorns.

trait.name: Captain's Halter
trait.description: Because the Captain must stand in harm's way to shelter her comrades, her steed, too, must be heavily armoured in well-oiled steel plate.

trait.name: Minstrel's Halter
trait.description: A merry halter of motley and bright red ribbon for the steed who aids the Minstrel's noble cause.

trait.name: Red Guard Elite Halter
trait.description: A mighty, heavy halter of burnished silver and rich, red velvet.

trait.name: Warden's Saddle
trait.description: A strong but flexible saddle helps to safeguard the Warden in battle.

trait.name: Minstrel's Caparison
trait.description: A festive motley blanket hung with tiny silver bells that chime out the melody of battle.

trait.name: Red Guard Elite Saddle
trait.description: A fine leather saddle accented with silver filigree.

trait.name: Hunter's Halter
trait.description: This sleek halter keeps a steed's mane out of the way of snagging branches, and helps steed and rider to find the path in thick and shadowed undergrowth.

trait.name: Warden's Leggings
trait.description: When on the brink of victory, these heavy leg guards can give both steed and rider the momentum they need to ensure a win.

trait.name: Minstrel's Leggings
trait.description: Cross-gartered leggings of silken ribbon that match the Minstrel's triumphant spirit.

trait.name: Captain's Caparison
trait.description: The Captain acts as a herald of hope to the Free Peoples of Middle-earth, and so her steed is dressed in festive barding meant to dazzle and inspire.

trait.name: Captain's Gear
trait.description: In a time of need, the Captain must have everything she requires, such as a bedroll and her helmet, within easy reach.

trait.name: Red Guard Elite Tail
trait.description: A durable red-and-gold metal plate made to hold a steed's tail neatly in place.

trait.name: Horsehead's Banner Accessory
trait.description: This bright flag leaves no question about for whose side you fight. As you ride to war, show your foes that Rohan is a force to be feared.

trait.name: King's Banner Accessory
trait.description: Let fly the colours of Thoden King! Show your enemies whose land it is they threaten, and assure it is the last thing they ever learn.

trait.name: Plain Black Saddle
trait.description: A simple black saddle.

trait.name: Simple Tail
trait.description: Let your War-steed's tail flow free and wild, the way it was meant to be.

trait.name: Orc Head on a Pike Accessory
trait.description: The head of an Orc on a pike. A gruesome trophy.

trait.name: Men of the Sutcrofts - Travel Discount
trait.tooltip: This gives the player a 25% discount from all Sutcrofts stable-masters.
trait.description: You receive a discount from all Sutcrofts stable-masters.

trait.name: Men of the Wold - Travel Discount
trait.tooltip: This gives the player a 25% discount from all Wold stable-masters.
trait.description: You receive a discount from all Wold stable-masters.

trait.name: Men of the Norcrofts - Travel Discount
trait.tooltip: This gives the player a 25% discount from all Norcrofts stable-masters.
trait.description: You receive a discount from all Norcrofts stable-masters.

trait.name: Men of Entwash Vale - Travel Discount
trait.tooltip: This gives the player a 25% discount from all Entwash Vale stable-masters.
trait.description: You receive a discount from all Entwash Vale stable-masters.

trait.name: Footpad
trait.description: You are harder to detect while Stealthed.

trait.name: Back Stab
trait.description: Positional attacks deal more damage.

trait.name: Hidden Dagger
trait.description: Deal more damage from Stealth.

trait.name: Deft Strikes
trait.description: Increases Critical Chance.

trait.name: Aim
trait.description: Earns the skill: Aim.

trait.name: Playful Mind
trait.description: Increases the duration of your Tricks.

trait.name: Trick: Dust In the Eyes
trait.description: Earns Trick: Dust in the Eyes.

trait.name: Practical Joke
trait.description: Increases Trick and Trick Removal skill damage.

trait.name: Startling Twist
trait.description:
Rank 1 earns the skill: Startling Twist.
Rank 2 allows Startling Twist to affect multiple enemies.

trait.name: Trickster
trait.description: Your next Trick is applied to multiple targets and can stack a normal Trick.

trait.name: Trick: Counter Defence
trait.description: Earns Trick: Counter-Defence.

trait.name: Perplexing Proposition
trait.description: Trick Removal skills can be used more often.

trait.name: Leaf Walker
trait.description: You are harder to detect while Stealthed.

trait.name: Stick and Move
trait.description: Boosts Evade chance.

trait.name: Cruel Odds
trait.description: Increases damage of Gamble applying skills.

trait.name: Honed Wit
trait.description: Increases the damage of damage-over-time effects.

trait.name: Trip
trait.description: Earns the skill: Trip.

trait.name: Wildermore - Vendor Discount
trait.tooltip: This provides players with a discount with all Wildermore vendors.
trait.description: You receive a discount from all Wildermore vendors.

trait.name: Wildermore - Travel Discount
trait.tooltip: This gives the player a 10% discount from all Wildermore stable-masters.
trait.description: You receive a discount from all Wildermore stable-masters.

trait.name: Barbed Fury
trait.description: Increases damage for any skill that deals damage over time.

trait.name: Rain of Thorns
trait.description: Earns the skill: Rain of Thorns.

trait.name: Combat Traps
trait.description: Increases Trap damage and reduced Trap cooldowns.

stat.name: Skill_Hunter_RecoveryTime_Trait_TrapRecovery
stat.descriptionOverride: -${VALUE} Seconds off all Trap Skill Cooldowns

trait.name: True Shot
trait.description: Increases the target critical chance vulnerability of Penetrating Shot.

trait.name: Fast Draw
trait.description: Using Quick Shot grants a stacking buff which reduces the inductions of attacks.

trait.name: Explosive Arrow
trait.description: Earns the skill: Explosive Arrow.

trait.name: Critical Eye
trait.description: Increases Critical Chance.

trait.name: Split Shot
trait.description:
Earns the skill: Split Shot.
Subsequent ranks increase number of targets.

trait.name: High Spirits
trait.description: Your presence on the battlefield inspires those around you, allowing allies to derive more benefit from all restoration effects.

trait.name: Bond of the Lore-master
trait.description: The bond of the Lore-master is strong. With it, allies may benefit from an increased knowledge of beasts and the natural world alike.

specialEffect.label: Unlocks the skill Bond of the Lore-master

trait.name: Feast of Crows
trait.description:
Your affinity with beasts allows you to attract even more crows with your Radiant Burst, affecting additional enemies in the area.
At Rank 1, your Radiant Burst skill becomes Radiant Blast and will affect 2 targets.

trait.name: Riding Companion
trait.description: Your understanding of the speech of animals allows you to call one to your side whilst atop your steed.

specialEffect.label: Unlocks the skill Riding Companion: War Wolf

trait.name: Rolling Thunder
trait.description:
Your steed rides towards your enemies like a force of nature, with thunderous hooves and lightning in its eyes.
At Rank 1, your Intimidate skill will become Rolling Thunder and will affect 2 targets.

trait.name: Well-disciplined
trait.description: Well-versed in the disciplines of Mounted Combat, you are able to derive greater benefit while riding, regardless of the situation.

stat.name: MC_Trait_Loremaster_IncHealing_Rohirrim
stat.descriptionOverride: In Rohirrim: Increases Outgoing and Incoming Healing by an additional ${PERCENTVALUE}

stat.name: MC_Trait_Loremaster_PowerCost_Riddermark
stat.descriptionOverride: In Riddermark: Reduces the cost of all mounted skills by an additional ${PERCENTVALUE}

stat.name: MC_Trait_Loremaster_MeleeDamage_RedDawn
stat.descriptionOverride: In Red Dawn: Increases damage by an additional ${PERCENTVALUE}

trait.name: Bred for War
trait.description: Your animal companions were introduced into the battlefield at a young age and, as such, display great prowess in mounted combat.

trait.name: Deadly Aim
trait.description: Your concentration is unbreakable. Once you have an enemy in your sights, there is little they can do to escape the wrath of your bow.

stat.name: IA_Hunter_MissChanceMod_EstablishingShot
stat.descriptionOverride: You have a ${PERCENTVALUE} chance of maintaining your Establishing Shot buff after performing a critical hit.

trait.name: Rig the Battlefield
trait.description: A trapper at heart, you are able to quickly and efficiently turn the battlefield into a sea of peril.

specialEffect.label: You will lay down an additional trap with your Lay Trap skill

trait.name: Shoot to Kill
trait.description: Sensing the disparity of your enemy's situation, you take aim, and are able to bring about a swift end to the fight.

stat.name: MC_Trait_Hunter_KillShot_MissChance
stat.descriptionOverride: Kill Shot no longer has an inherent miss chance.

stat.name: MC_Trait_Hunter_Application_ShootToKill
stat.descriptionOverride: You have a ${PERCENTVALUE} chance to deal extra damage and reset the cooldown of Kill Shot when used on targets below 50% health.

trait.name: Lay Trap
trait.description: Your skill in combat and experience with trapping allow you to lay snares on the go. You throw down a trap behind you that will last for 60s or until triggered by an enemy.

specialEffect.label: Unlocks the skill Lay Trap

trait.name: Furious Assault
trait.description: In the heat of battle, it is not uncommon to lose one's self to the rush of power. Affecting both rider and steed alike, this can be used to great advantage against your foes.

stat.name: MC_Trait_Hunter_Application_FuriousAssault
stat.descriptionOverride: Your attacks have a ${PERCENTVALUE} chance to refill your Fury bar.

trait.name: Well-disciplined
trait.description: Well-versed in the disciplines of Mounted Combat, you are able to derive greater benefit while riding, regardless of the situation.

stat.name: MC_Trait_Hunter_EvadeChance_Rohirrim
stat.descriptionOverride: In Rohirrim: Increases Rider Evade Chance by an additional ${PERCENTVALUE}

stat.name: MC_Trait_Hunter_Damage_Riddermark
stat.descriptionOverride: In Riddermark: Increases damage by an additional ${PERCENTVALUE}

stat.name: MC_Trait_Hunter_CritChance_RedDawn
stat.descriptionOverride: In Red Dawn: Increases critical damage by an additional ${PERCENTVALUE}

trait.name: Eyes of the Hunter
trait.description: The embodiment of a natural-born predator, you are able to share your secrets of the hunt with those around you.

specialEffect.label: Unlocks the skill Eyes of the Hunter

trait.name: Call of the Cavalry
trait.description: You cry out with a renewed vigour from atop your steed, disheartening any foolish enough to stand in your way.

specialEffect.label: Unlocks the skill Call of the Cavalry

trait.name: Echoes of War
trait.description: Your cry rings out, persisting in the ears and minds of those unfortunate enough to have ridden near.

stat.name: MC_Trait_Warden_Cavalry_HealBuff
stat.descriptionOverride: In Rohirrim: Increases healing done by Call of the Cavalry by ${PERCENTVALUE}.

stat.name: MC_Trait_Warden_Cavalry_AttackSpeedBuff
stat.descriptionOverride: In Riddermark: Increases the attack speed buff from Call of the Cavalry by ${PERCENTVALUE}.

stat.name: MC_Trait_Warden_Cavalry_DamageBuff
stat.descriptionOverride: In Red Dawn: Increases the damage done by Call of the Cavalry by ${PERCENTVALUE}.

trait.name: Well-disciplined
trait.description: Well-versed in the disciplines of Mounted Combat, you are able to derive greater benefit while riding, regardless of the situation.

stat.name: MC_Trait_Warden_MountArmor_Rohirrim
stat.descriptionOverride: In Rohirrim: Increases your War-steed's armour by an additional ${VALUE}

stat.name: MC_Trait_Warden_MountEndurance_Riddermark
stat.descriptionOverride: In Riddermark: Increases your War-steed's Morale by an additional ${PERCENTVALUE}

stat.name: MC_Trait_Warden_MeleeDamage_RedDawn
stat.descriptionOverride: In Red Dawn: Increases damage by an additional ${PERCENTVALUE}

trait.name: A Warden's Resolve
trait.description: Through a steadfast demeanor and an unshakeable resolve, you inspire your allies to greatness in the face of adversity.

specialEffect.label: Unlocks the skill A Warden's Resolve

trait.name: Inspiring Cries
trait.description: With each of your cries, you are able to draw forth a renewed hope and the will to fight on.

stat.name: MC_Trait_Warden_Application_InspiringCries_Heal
stat.descriptionOverride: Tactical skills have a ${PERCENTVALUE} chance to apply a heal over time to yourself.

trait.name: Serrated Blades
trait.description: Your weapon cuts deep with each attack, ensuring injuries which will not be soon forgotten.

stat.name: MC_Trait_Warden_Application_SerratedBlades_Bleed
stat.descriptionOverride: Physical skills have a ${PERCENTVALUE} chance to add a bleed to your target.

trait.name: Unsurpassed Skill
trait.description: Your prowess on horseback is unrivaled, making you a much more formidable foe in combat. Your Lancer's Charge, Shield the Flank, and Halt the Charge skills are enhanced.

stat.name: Skill_AttackHook_VsUnMounted_Damage_Multiplier
stat.descriptionOverride: Lancer's Charge provides ${PERCENTVALUE} increased damage to unmounted units.

stat.name: MC_Trait_Warden_ShieldtheFlank_Mitigation
stat.descriptionOverride: Shield the Flank: Reduces Incoming Damage by an additional ${PERCENTVALUE}

stat.name: MC_Trait_Warden_HaltTheCharge_AttackSpeed
stat.descriptionOverride: Halt the Charge will slow the enemy's attack speed by ${PERCENTVALUE}.

trait.name: Affinity for Battle
trait.description: Your experience with Dagor runes has led you to become a much more potent adversary on the battlefield.

trait.name: Well-disciplined
trait.description: Well-versed in the disciplines of Mounted Combat, you are able to derive greater benefit while riding, regardless of the situation.

stat.name: Trait_Mounted_Minstrel_Rohirrim_Healing
stat.descriptionOverride:
Rohirrim: +5% Out-going Healing
Riddermark: +5% Critical Chance
Red Dawn: +5% Damage

trait.name: Runic Fury
trait.description: Fuelled by fury, you are able to dig deep and unleash an unrelenting assault on your foes.

stat.name: MC_Trait_Hunter_Application_FuriousAssault
stat.descriptionOverride: Your attacks have a +${PERCENTVALUE} chance to completely refill your fury bar.

trait.name: Superior Evocation
trait.description: Your mastery of runes is unparalleled, allowing you to derive much greater benefit from their use.

specialEffect.label: Unlocks the skill Superior Evocation

trait.name: Rider's Bond
trait.description: Your time in battle has shown you that without your steed, you are nothing. By refocusing your efforts, you ensure that neither of you will fall at the hands of the enemy.

trait.name: Knowledge of the Rune-keeper
trait.description: You impart wisdom of the ways of old unto your allies, showing them that knowledge is, in fact, power.

specialEffect.label: Unlocks the skill Knowledge of the Runekeeper

trait.name: Persistent Burn
trait.description: Your words burn with a fiery intensity, searing your enemies in a way that they will not soon forget.

trait.name: Furious Storms
trait.description:
Lightning skills place a stack of Fury of Storm on the Rune-keeper, increasing the Critical Damage of their next attack.
Critical hits will consume this effect.

trait.name: Confounding Principles
trait.description: Increases the damage and daze duration of Shocking touch.

trait.name: Tale of Rage
trait.description:
Fire skills increase the fire damage of the Rune-keeper.
This effect can stack up to five times.

trait.name: Essence of Flame
trait.description: Single target attack that refreshes the current tier of Fiery Ridicule on a target.

trait.name: After-burn
trait.description: Increases fire damage-over-time.

stat.name: Skill_Runekeeper_Fire_DoT_Damage
stat.descriptionOverride: Increases Fire Damage Over Time by +${PERCENTVALUE}

trait.name: Thunderous Words
trait.description: Lightning skills have a chance to briefly buff lightning skill's Critical Chance.

trait.name: Ceaseless Argument
trait.description: Earns the skill: Ceaseless Argument.

trait.name: Conflagration of Runes
trait.description:
Increases the damage of Fiery Ridicule.
At max rank, Fiery Ridicule affects up to three targets.

trait.name: Scathing Mockery
trait.description: Earns the skill: Scathing Mockery.

trait.name: Mending Verse
trait.description: Earns the skill: Mending Verse.

trait.name: Rune of Restoration
trait.description: Earns the skill: Rune of Restoration.

trait.name: Trick: Impugn Character
trait.description: A new and deadly trick that insults your foe into such a rage it will turn on a nearby ally and attack it.

specialEffect.label: Unlocks the skill Trick: Impugn Character

trait.name: Deep Strike
trait.description: Strategic Strike will now apply a bleed to targets when it critically hits. Increasing the rank of this trait will lengthen the duration of the Strategic Strike bleed.

trait.name: With Cause
trait.description: Keen Strike is improved, bestowing an effect that lowers the target's Physical Mitigation. Increasing the rank of this trait will cause a lower amount of physical mitigation on the target.

trait.name: Razor's Edge
trait.description: Your overall melee damage is increased.

trait.name: Well-Disciplined
trait.description: Well-versed in the disciplines of Mounted Combat, you are able to derive greater benefit while riding, regardless of the situation.

trait.name: Burglar's Treat
trait.description:
A Burglar likes to trick his foes and treat his friends. Based on your discipline, you treat yourself and your allies with benefits when you land critical hits:
Red Dawn: Nearby allies receive a +10% Devastate Chance for 15 seconds.
Riddermark: Grants a health bubble to nearby allies and their war-steeds for 18 seconds.
Rohirrim: +200 War-steed armour for 24 seconds.

specialEffect.label: Unlocks the skill Burglar's Treat.

trait.name: Flick of the Wrist
trait.description: All in the Wrist is improved, granting additional benefits based on your current discipline.

stat.name: Trait_Mount_Burglar_Bleed_Duration
stat.descriptionOverride:
Rohirrim: You and your allies receive a 6% evasion bonus for 6 seconds.
Riddermark: Adds an effect that increases Positional Damage by ${PERCENTVALUE}.
Red Dawn: All in the Wrist bleed duration increased.

trait.name: Tale of Eorl
trait.description: The Minstrel has learned the tale of Eorl the Young. The future first King of Rohan responded to Gondor's call for aid and led an Eored to the Field of Celebrant where they helped defeat the Balchoth. The tale inspires those who hear it, increasing their ability to help and receive help from their allies.

trait.name: Intimidate
trait.description: You are able to intimidate your opponent, striking fear into their heart so that they flee in terror.

trait.name: Deadly Strikes
trait.description: Increases Critical damage for all Strike skills.

trait.name: Mighty Blast
trait.description:
Increases Horn of Gondor damage.
At max rank, Horn of Gondor reduces Cry resistance.

trait.name: Ardent Rage
trait.description:
Increases the Fervour generated by Battle Frenzy.
Max rank lowers the cooldown of Battle Frenzy and replaces its Fervour regeneration effect with a more powerful version.

trait.name: Sweeping Riposte
trait.description: Grants the skill: Sweeping Riposte.

trait.name: Vicious Strikes
trait.description: Every hit on Strikes skills have an increased chance to critically hit.

trait.name: Athletic
trait.description:
Reduces the cooldown of Sprint.
At max rank, Sprint will cause the Champion's next attack to briefly stun the target.

trait.name: Battle Frenzy
trait.description: Grants the skill: Battle Frenzy.

trait.name: Thrill of Battle
trait.description: Critical hits with response skills will heal you for a percentage of your max Morale. This heal can't trigger more than once every 8 seconds.

trait.name: The Quiet Rider
trait.description: You have mastered the art of riding and knowing where to strike your enemies. With each rank your positional damage will increase and your perceived threat will decrease.

trait.name: Goading Strike
trait.description: You strike, not necessarily to deal damage, but to goad your foe into attacking you. You will be ready for their next attack and your strategy strengthens you and your allies.

trait.name: Pledge of Protection
trait.description: The greatest pledges of protection come from those who are guardians, as their oath to those who need help cannot be broken by word or by action. But no oath can be taken lightly by the one who promises to protect, as compromises and sacrifices are often required by those who serve a higher purpose.

trait.name: Master of Defence
trait.description: You are adept at blocking and parrying attacks while riding a war-steed.

trait.name: Strength of Steel
trait.description: Your armour is strengthened against hits, reducing the amount of wear received during mounted combat.

trait.name: Rohan's Edge
trait.description: Rohan's Edge does increased damage and the duration of Rohan's Edge is increased.

trait.name: By The Right Flank
trait.description: Your target cannot deny your threats and will close in on you to flank your side. You can take this opportunity to break its armour and will.

trait.name: Gift of Rohan
trait.description: Your Pledge to Rohan emboldens you, granting Morale on use.

stat.name: Trait_Mounted_Guardian_PledgeToRohan_Morale
stat.descriptionOverride: Rank 1: Pledge to Rohan Heals for 500 Morale Rank 2: Pledge to Rohan Heals for 750 Morale Rank 3: Pledge to Rohan Heals for 1000 Morale

trait.name: War Pledge
trait.description: Well-versed in the disciplines of Mounted Combat, you are able to derive greater benefit while riding, regardless of the situation.

trait.name: Second Wind
trait.description: Grants the skill: Second Wind.

trait.name: Well-disciplined
trait.description: Well-versed in the disciplines of Mounted Combat, you are able to derive greater benefit while riding, regardless of the situation.

trait.name: Projection
trait.description: The Minstrel is well-versed in the spoken word and is able to project when shouting a battle cry.

trait.name: Repetition
trait.description: The Minstrel has sung their ballads many times and is familiar with every pitch and note. Their repetition gives their Coda a chance to not cash out Ballad and Anthem Buffs.

trait.name: Hammer of Hornburg
trait.description: The Minstrel has waged battle throughout Rohan and has learned to wield their weaponry with devastating proficiency.

trait.name: The Last Stand of Helm Hammerhand
trait.description: You sing the song of the ninth King of Rohan, and the tale of his last stand inspires those who hear it to fight to the bitter end.

trait.name: Brutal Charge
trait.tooltip: Your Charge becomes Brutal Charge.
trait.description: Your Charge becomes Brutal Charge.

specialEffect.label: Your Charge becomes Brutal Charge. Increases your melee damage for a short period of time. Will attempt to knock down your next target(s).

trait.name: Invigourating Parry
trait.description: Critical hits with your parry response skills will restore power.

trait.name: Well-Disciplined
trait.description: Well-versed in the disciplines of Mounted Combat, you are able to derive greater benefit while riding, regardless of the situation.

trait.name: Authority
trait.description: The Captain's cries ring with such authority that all who hear must take notice.

trait.name: Strength of the Steed
trait.description: Your war-steed's strength is your own, and its momentum and movement contribute to the damage dealt by your melee attacks.

trait.name: Bellow
trait.description: The Captain's cries grow louder and stronger and when they Rally the Riders, it is even more effective.

trait.name: Bond of the Rider and the Steed
trait.description: The bond you share with your war-steed strengthens with every battle and your ability to work as one increases your effectiveness in combat.

trait.name: Cry Vengeance
trait.description: There will be no vengeance for those who oppose the Captain. Defeating an enemy invigorates the Captain, allowing them to let out a mighty cry.

trait.name: Motivation
trait.description: The Captain is able to rally the fellowship and have them prepared to fell any foe who may get in their way

trait.name: Appraising Eye
trait.description: The skill Reveal Weakness does more damage.

trait.name: Complicated Terms
trait.description: Increases the grace period of your crowd control effects.

trait.name: Trick: Enrage
trait.description: Earns Trick: Enrage.

trait.name: Opportunist
trait.description: The skill Subtle Stab does additional damage to targets with an active Trick on them. Additional ranks increase the damage dealt.

trait.name: Burglar's Antidote
trait.description: The skill Burglar's Antidote now applies to the Fellowship.

specialEffect.label: Cure Poison and Burglar's Antidote now affect the entire Fellowship.

trait.name: Double Down
trait.description: Diversion has a chance to apply a debilitating gamble. Provoke has a chance to apply a Daze. Provoke's chance is increased when applied from Stealth.

specialEffect.label: Provoke has a chance to daze. Diversion has a chance to apply a debilitating gamble.

trait.name: Aggravated Bleeds
trait.description: Increases the duration of damage-over-time dealt by Gambler's Advantage and Cunning Attack.

trait.name: Even the Odds
trait.description: The skill Double-edged Strike may grant you a random buff when used on a target with an active Gamble.

trait.name: All In
trait.description: Earns the skill: All In.

trait.name: Swift and Subtle
trait.description: Improves the Heal over Time from Bob and Weave.

trait.name: Saddled Mordor Warg Appearance
trait.tooltip: A different visual appearance for your Warg Stalker: a rider-less Warg covered in the armour of Mordor.
trait.description: A different visual appearance for your Warg Stalker: a rider-less Warg covered in the armour of Mordor.

trait.name: Mordor Whipmaster Appearance
trait.tooltip: A different visual appearance for your Uruk Warleader: an armoured Uruk of Mordor.
trait.description: A different visual appearance for your Uruk Warleader: an armoured Uruk of Mordor.

trait.name: Mordor Morgul-arrow Appearance
trait.tooltip: A different visual appearance for your Uruk Blackarrow: an Uruk of Mordor.
trait.description: A different visual appearance for your Uruk Blackarrow: an Uruk of Mordor.

trait.name: Skulled Mordor Orc Appearance
trait.tooltip: A different visual appearance for your Orc Defiler: an ancient defiler of Mordor.
trait.description: A different visual appearance for your Orc Defiler: an ancient defiler of Mordor.

trait.name: Mordor Conscript Appearance
trait.tooltip: A different visual appearance for your Orc Reaver: an Orc of Mordor.
trait.description: A different visual appearance for your Orc Reaver: an Orc of Mordor.

trait.name: Brown Hairy Spider Appearance
trait.tooltip: A different visual appearance for your Spider Weaver: a large, brown, hairy spider.
trait.description: A different visual appearance for your Spider Weaver: a large, brown, hairy spider.

trait.name: Command
trait.description: A Captain conducts themself in a manner that commands respect and their foes often find themselves playing right into the Captains' hands.

trait.name: Noble Mark
trait.description: Earns the skill: Noble Mark.

specialEffect.label: Unlocks the skill Noble Mark

trait.name: Telling Mark
trait.description: Earns the skill: Telling Mark.

specialEffect.label: Unlocks the skill Telling Mark

trait.name: Revealing Mark
trait.description: Earns the skill: Revealing Mark.

specialEffect.label: Unlocks the skill Revealing Mark

trait.name: Lust for Blood
trait.description:
Seeing your enemies take a nasty blow sends you into a frenzy.
Mounted strike, Swift Cut, Sundering Blow, and Crippling Shot generate an additional point of Fervour on critical hit.

specialEffect.label: On critical hit: +1 Fervour

trait.name: Precise Strikes
trait.description: Through practice and warfare, you have perfected the art of causing long term harm to your enemies. Making you much more effective on the battlefield.

trait.name: Well-disciplined
trait.description:
Well-versed in the disciplines of Mounted Combat, you are able to derive greater benefit while riding, regardless of the situation.
Red Dawn:Increases Critical Damage bonus by 5%
Riddermark: Increases Damage bonus by 5%
Rohirrim: Increases War-steed armour bonus by 50

stat.name: Trait_Mounted_Guardian_Rohirrim_Armour
stat.descriptionOverride:
Rohirrim: +100 War-steed Armour
Riddermark: +5% Damage
Red Dawn: +5% Critical Damage

trait.name: One With Your Steed
trait.description: Having a strong connexion with your War-steed is important and allows both to act as one force of destruction on the battlefield.

stat.name: MC_Trait_Champion_Application_Fervour_Consumption
stat.descriptionOverride: -${PERCENTVALUE} chance that Recuperate, Destabilizing Strike, and Horn Blast will not consume fervour on use

trait.name: Crippling Shot
trait.description: Seeing your enemy at a distance, you instinctively let loose an arrow, catching your foe off guard.

specialEffect.label: Unlocks the skill Crippling Shot

trait.name: Champion Strength
trait.description: Known to many as ferocious warriors, your mere presence strengthens your allies.

specialEffect.label: Unlocks the skill Strength of Champions.

trait.name: Resilient Combatant
trait.description: Your experience in battle has taught you how to survive the most horrendous of wounds.

specialEffect.label: Heals the champion for 10% of max health upon falling below 20% health. This effect can only occur once every 60 seconds.

trait.name: Coax
trait.description: You issue forth a mighty scream taunting your enemy and coaxing them to ride alongside of you.

specialEffect.label: Unlocks the skill Coax

trait.name: Song of Unity
trait.description: The Minstrel sings a song that allows them to instantly reap the benefit of two ballads and unlock their Coda

stat.name: Minstrel_Application_Coda_Reset
stat.descriptionOverride: At Rank 2, Song of Unity resets cooldowns on Cries and Calls

trait.name: In For The Kill
trait.description: Heart Seeker reduces incoming healing and increases its bleed damage.

trait.name: Quick Escape
trait.description: Low Cut applies a root and temporarily allows you to move without losing Focus.

trait.name: Upshot
trait.description: Earns the skill: Upshot.

trait.name: Hail of Arrows
trait.description: Each target critically hit with Rain of Arrows has a 50% chance to reduce the skill's cooldown. Becomes 100% at Tier 2.

trait.name: Burn Hot
trait.description: Earns the skill: Burn Hot. Second rank reduces the cooldown and increases the damage and ranged power cost reduction of Burn Hot.

trait.name: Rain of Arrows
trait.description: Earns the skill: Rain of Arrows.

trait.name: Mercy Kill
trait.description: Increases Merciful Shot's Critical Multiplier.

trait.name: Advanced Placement
trait.description: Changes all Traps to ranged, ground-targeted skills.

trait.name: Impact Arrows
trait.description: Increases Ranged Damage.

trait.name: Strength of Earth
trait.description: Earns the skill: Strength of the Earth.

trait.name: Shot Through The Heart
trait.description: Heart Seeker and Merciful Shot do additional damage to targets with bleeds on them.

trait.name: Bow of the Righteous
trait.description: Recover Power with each successful ranged skill.

stat.name: Trait_BowoftheRighteous_ApplicationChance
stat.descriptionOverride: Hunter ranged skills return a small amount of power

trait.name: Blood Arrow
trait.description: Blood arrow now applies an additional HoT.

trait.name: Rapid Fire

trait.name: Wild Swings

Increases Wild Attacks damage.
At max rank, Wild Attack Critical hits increase Critical Chance for a short duration.

trait.description: Grants the skill: Unbreakable.

trait.description: Increases the damage of Raging Blade.

trait.name: Vigour of Champions
trait.description: Increases Power restored from Second Wind.

trait.name: Deep Strikes

trait.name: Unstable
trait.description: Upon being Critically hit, the Champion deals bonus damage.

trait.name: Hamstrung

trait.name: Raging Blade

trait.description: Increases the heal of Dire Need.

trait.name: Exposed Throat

trait.name: Heartening Prank
trait.description: Increases max Morale.

trait.name: Agile Hands
trait.description: Increases Critical Magnitude.

trait.name: A Sure Thing

trait.name: Strike From Shadows

trait.name: Enduring Assailment
trait.description: Increase the debuff duration of Assailment Gambit debuffs.

trait.name: Lasting Mark
trait.description: Increase the Duration of Marked Target and Diminished Target.

stat.name: Skill_Warden_MarkedTarget_Duration
stat.descriptionOverride: +${VALUE}s Marked Target and Diminished Target duration

trait.name: Area Targeting
trait.description: Marked Target and Diminished Target will affect up to 4 additional targets.

trait.name: Bulls-eye
trait.description:
Increases your Critical rating, and grants 1% Ranged Critical damage per rank.
At max rank, gain a significant Critical Damage bonus.

trait.name: Suppression
trait.description: Increases the outgoing damage debuff in the Ranged Offensive Strike Gambit line.

trait.name: Ranged Damage
trait.description: Increases your Ranged damage rating.

trait.name: Shield's Up
trait.description: Swapping into melee stance will grant you a temporary Block buff.

specialEffect.label: +5% Block Chance after entering 'In the Fray'

trait.name: Barbed Javelins
trait.description:
All Javelin Gambits have a chance to trigger a Bleed. The more builders used to make the Gambit, the more damaging the Bleed will be.
Bleeds of the same tier will not stack.

trait.name: Battering Strikes
trait.description: Increases the Critical Defence debuff rating in the Precise Throw Gambit line.

trait.name: Shattered Javelins
trait.description:
Attempting to stack a Barbed Javelins bleed will instead consume the bleed for an area effect damage burst.
The more powerful the bleed, the more powerful the damage burst will be.

trait.name: Momentum
trait.description: Swapping into melee stance will grant you a temporary Melee damage buff.

trait.name: Hurry Up with That!
trait.description: Ranged Adroit Manoeuvre triggers an Induction duration buff to your fellowship.

trait.name: Piercing Javelins
trait.description: Ranged Gambits bypass enemy armour.

trait.name: Javelin of Deadly Force
trait.description:
Earns the skill Javelin of Deadly Force, enabling a Javelin attack that can pierce many enemies at once.
For every target hit, you gain a stack of a Ranged Damage and Critical Damage buff.

trait.name: Firm Grasp
trait.description: Increases Breakout Grace Period on all crowd-control skills.

trait.name: Frost-lore
trait.description: Improves the potency of Frost-lore's Tactical Damage Debuff.

trait.name: Disable
trait.description: Increases Stun duration.

trait.name: Level-headed
trait.description: Decreases Power Cost of skills.

trait.name: Quick Hands
trait.description: Reduces duration of all Lore-master inductions.

trait.name: Fire-lore
trait.description: Improves the potency of Fire-lore's Melee Damage Debuff.

trait.name: Pleasant Breeze
trait.description: A critical hit with Gust of Wind will allow you to direct a pleasant breeze to your allies, restoring some Morale.

trait.name: Storm-lore
trait.description:
Earns the skill: Storm-lore.
Increases Lightning Damage per rank.

trait.name: Playing with Fire
trait.description: Adds unique debuffs when using a Fire, Frost, or Lightning skill on a target afflicted with Fire-lore:

specialEffect.label:
Fire: +15% Attack Duration Frost: +10% Miss Chance Lightning: -50% Ranged Damage
This event cannot be triggered by Nature's Fury

trait.name: Ancient Craft
trait.description:
Increases Armour Debuff of Ancient Craft
At third rank, Ancient Craft causes the first Lightning Skill to be used against a target to deal bonus damage.
At max rank, your armour is 5% more effective.

trait.name: Mending Lore
trait.description: Increases Outgoing Healing per Rank. At max rank, increases the Incoming Healing buff on Water-lore.

trait.name: The Ancient Master
trait.description: Earns the skill: The Ancient Master.

trait.name: Flow of Power
trait.description: Increases Power restoration by Power of Knowledge and Share the Power.

trait.name: Out in the Cold
trait.description: Adds unique debuffs when using a Fire, Frost, or Lightning skill on a target afflicted with Frost-lore:

specialEffect.label:
Frost: Tactical Mastery Debuff Fire: +20% Skill Inductions Lightning: +15% Power Cost
This event cannot be triggered by Nature's Fury

trait.name: Poignant Phrases
trait.description: Increases Critical Healing.

trait.name: Cacophonous Timeless Echoes
trait.description: Increases the damage done by Timeless Echoes.

trait.name: The Fundamentals
trait.description: Increases the damage of Ballads and Codas.

trait.name: Weakening Echoes of Battle
trait.description: Echoes of Battle deals more damage and further reduces the enemy's Resistance.

trait.name: Resonant Piercing Cry
trait.description: Tune your Piercing Cry to both help your allies and harm your foes.

specialEffect.label: Scoring a Critical Hit with Resonant Piercing Cry places an area around the target lasting 20s. Bolster Courage and Raise the Spirit are more effective on allies within this area.

trait.name: Enduring Morale
trait.description:
Increases max Morale.
At rank 3 Call of the Second Age gains a short Stun effect.

trait.name: Pause for Breath
trait.description:
Healing skills have a chance to refund their Power cost.
At max rank, heals refund more than their Power cost.

trait.name: Soothing Voice
trait.description: Increases the potency of Heals.

trait.name: Legend of Helm Hammerhand
trait.description: Earns the skill: Legend of Helm Hammerhand.

trait.name: Echoing Anthem of War
trait.description: Anthem of War improves your allies' Tactical damage.

trait.name: Piercing Ballads
trait.description: Increases the Critical Chance of Ballad skills.

trait.name: Improved Hero's Strike
trait.description: Increases damage and healing done by Hero's Strike.

trait.name: Call to Greatness
trait.description: Earns the skill: Call to Greatness

trait.name: Improved Coda of Melody
trait.description: Coda of Melody will also increase the fellowships Incoming Healing.

specialEffect.label: +10% Incoming Healing from Coda of Melody

trait.name: Improved Coda of Fury
trait.description: Coda of Fury has a chance to reset the cooldown of all Cries and Calls. You cannot gain this effect more than once every 25s.

trait.name: Tactical Mastery
trait.description: Increases Tactical Mastery rating.

trait.name: Improved Chord of Salvation
trait.description: Chord of Salvation gains a fellowship-wide heal.

stat.name: Skill_Minstrel_ImpChordSalvation_HoT
stat.descriptionOverride: Chord of Salvation now grants a fellowship-wide Heal

trait.name: Improved Song of the Hammerhand
trait.description: Enhances the potency the bubble from Song of the Hammerhand.

trait.name: Song of Arda
trait.description: The Minstrel's Light damage is improved.

trait.name: Change of Pace - Heal!
trait.description: Offensive skills have a chance to grant you a buff that will make your next healing skill crit.

trait.name: Follow Up
trait.description: Critical Heals speed up skill use.

trait.name: Improved Call of Orom
trait.description: Call of Orom affects more targets and deals more damage.

trait.name: Improved Inspire Fellows
trait.description: Inspire Fellows costs less Power, heals more Morale, and briefly reduces incoming damage.

trait.name: Cry of the Wizards
trait.description: Earns the skill: Cry of the Wizards.

trait.name: Sharing a Story
trait.description: A Critical hit with a Ballad will reset Piercing Cry cooldowns.

specialEffect.label: Ballad critical hits will reset the cooldown of all versions of Piercing Cry.

trait.name: Inspiring Cries and Calls
trait.description: Healing skills have a chance to reset the cooldown of Cries and Calls. You cannot gain this effect more than once every 30s.

trait.name: Improved Bolster Courage
trait.description: Bolster Courage delivers a more potent heal.

trait.name: Triumphant Spirit
trait.description: Earns the skill: Triumphant Spirit.

trait.name: Call of Orom
trait.description: Earns the skill: Call of Orom.

trait.name: Shielding Cry
trait.description: Piercing Cry causes some of the damage the Fellowship takes to be reflected upon your enemies.

specialEffect.label: Piercing Cry now grants allies a short-term damage reflection shield.

trait.name: Cry of the Valar
trait.description: Earns the skill: Cry of the Valar.

trait.name: Shield Focus
trait.description: Gain a defensive skill.

trait.name: Critical Strikes
trait.description: Increases Critical Chance and Critical Damage.

trait.name: Herald's Strength
trait.description: Dissonant Strike steals Morale from the enemy on a Critical Hit.

trait.name: Discordant Cries
trait.description: Increases the damage of Cries and Calls.

trait.name: Improved Coda of Resonance
trait.description: Coda of Resonance briefly reduces incoming damage.

trait.name: Quick Melody
trait.description: Lowers skill induction time, letting you heal faster.

trait.name: Anthem of Composure
trait.description: Earns the skill: Anthem of Composure.

trait.name: Strong Appeal
trait.description: Increases the Crit chance of heals.

trait.name: Strength of Helm Hammerhand
trait.description: Adds a Physical and Tactical Mastery buff to Song of the Hammerhand's and Gift of the Hammerhand's bubble.

trait.name: Extended Anthems
trait.description: Increases Anthem Duration

trait.name: Apprentice Riding
trait.tooltip: All of your mounts give +68% speed.
trait.description: All of your mounts are now +68% speed.

trait.name: Eorlingas - Vendor Discount
trait.tooltip: This provides players with a discount with all Eorling vendors.
trait.description: You receive a discount from all Eorling vendors.

trait.name: Eorlingas - Travel Discount
trait.tooltip: This gives the player a 10% discount from all Eorling stable-masters.
trait.description: You receive a discount from all Eorling stable-masters.

trait.name: Helmingas - Travel Discount
trait.tooltip: This gives the player a 10% discount from all Helming stable-masters.
trait.description: You receive a discount from all Helming stable-masters.

trait.name: Helmingas - Vendor Discount
trait.tooltip: This provides players with a discount with all Helming vendors.
trait.description: You receive a discount from all Helming vendors.

trait.name: Thrill of Danger
trait.description: Earns the skill: Thrill of Danger.

trait.name: Haemorrhage
trait.description: The Brutal Assault skill has a chance to apply a Haemorrhaging Wound. Each rank will increase the wound's damage over time.

trait.name: Tireless Defender
trait.description: Your Guardian's Ward skill will reduce skill power cost while active.

trait.name: War-chant
trait.description: Earns the skill: War-chant.

trait.name: Disorientation
trait.description: The skills Shield-smash and Shield-blow make it harder for your enemy to avoid attacks.

trait.name: Relentless Assault
trait.description: The Sting skill has a chance to provide a block and parry response.

trait.name: Bring on the Pain
trait.description: For a short period of time, your Thrill of Danger skill will allow you to restore a small amount of morale every time you are hit.

trait.name: Bolster
trait.description: Blocking attacks will increase your Critical Defence Rating. This effect may stack up to five times.

stat.name: Skill_Guardian_BlockResponse_Bolster_CritDefense
stat.descriptionOverride: Each Rank increases your Critical Defence bonus from bolster stacks.

trait.name: Redirect
trait.description: Earns the skill: Redirect.

trait.name: Warrior's Fortitude
trait.description: The Warrior's Heart skill will also increase your Physical Mastery rating, Incoming Healing, Evade chance, and Partial Evade chance. Note: Warrior's Fortitude bonuses from separate trees will not stack.

specialEffect.label: Your Warrior's Heart skill will also increase your Physical Mastery rating, Incoming Healing, Evade chance, and Partial Evade chances.

trait.name: Warrior's Fortitude
trait.description: The skill Warrior's Heart will also increase your Physical Mitigation, Incoming Healing, and Block chance. Note: Warrior's Fortitude bonuses from separate trees will not stack.

specialEffect.label: Your Warrior's Heart skill will also increase your Physical Mitigation, Incoming Healing, Block, and Partial Block chances

trait.name: Broad Strokes
trait.description: Sweeping Cut will affect additional targets and has a chance to apply a Bleed on hit.

trait.name: Guardian's Pledge
trait.description: Earns the skill: Guardian's Pledge.

trait.name: Blind Rage
trait.description: The To The King skill has a chance to trigger a Parry response.

trait.name: Reversal
trait.description: The Turn the Tables skill has a reduced cooldown, and will provide brief combat state immunity when used.

trait.name: Tireless Blows
trait.description: Parry responses have a chance to reset the cooldown of Brutal Assault.

trait.name: Defensive Expertise
trait.description: Increases your Block Rating.

trait.name: Thrust
trait.description: Earns the skill: Thrust.

trait.name: Shield-smash
trait.description: Earns the skill: Shield-smash.

trait.name: Skilled Deflection
trait.description: Increases your Parry Rating

trait.name: Bellow
trait.description: Reduces cooldown of Challenge. Increases the range of Challenge and Fray the Edge.

stat.name: Trait_Guardian_Taunt_Range
stat.descriptionOverride: +${PERCENTVALUE} Challenge and Fray the Edge Range

trait.name: Heavy Weapons Training
trait.description: Increases damage with each of your skills.

trait.name: Tenderize
trait.description: Parrying attacks will increase your Critical Rating. This effect may stack up to five times and will expire out of combat.

trait.name: Brutal Assault
trait.description: Earns the skill: Brutal Assault.

trait.name: Warrior's Fortitude
trait.description: The Warrior's Heart skill will also increase your Physical Mastery rating, Melee Crit chance, Parry chance, and Partial Parry chance. Note: Warrior's Fortitude bonuses from separate trees will not stack.

specialEffect.label: Your Warrior's Heart skill will also increase your Physical Mastery rating, Melee Crit chance, and Parry, and Partial Parry chances.

trait.name: To The King
trait.description: Earns the skill: To the King.

trait.name: Juggernaut
trait.description: Earns the skill: Juggernaut.

trait.name: Vicious Rebuttal
trait.description: The Redirect skill will absorb and reflect additional damage.

trait.name: Improved Shield Spikes
trait.description: Increases the duration and Crit chance of shield spikes.

trait.name: Deeper Wounds
trait.description: Increase the damage and duration of Deep Wound and Terrible Wounds.

trait.name: Hammer Down
trait.description: Earns the skill: Hammer Down.

trait.name: Cataclysmic Shout
trait.description: Earns the skill: Cataclysmic Shout.

trait.name: High-spirited
trait.description: Increases Incoming Healing.

trait.name: To The Rescue
trait.description: The Charge skill will provide additional run speed for a longer period of time.

trait.name: Demoralizing Anthem
trait.description: Increases the range and number of targets affected by your War-chant skill. War-chant will also reduce the cooldown of your Block/Parry Response skills.

trait.name: Returning Traveller
trait.tooltip: Grants a faster recovery time on Return To Skills.
trait.description: Return To Skill recovery time reduced by 30 minutes.
