trait.name: Of All Trades
trait.description: Increase damage and healing.

stat.name: Skill_ProcRate_Warden_SpearDot
stat.descriptionOverride: The inherent bleed damage from Spears happens more often.

stat.name: Skill_ProcRate_Warden_ClubDebuff
stat.descriptionOverride: The inherent attack speed debuff from Clubs happens more often.

stat.name: Skill_DamageMultiplier_Warden_SpearDot
stat.descriptionOverride: Damage from intrinsic spear bleeds is greatly increased.

trait.name: Martial Fury
trait.description:
Gambits in the Power Attack Gambit line and the Precise Blow Gambit line have 15% chance to apply a secondary DoT to their target which stacks with the normal DoT.
Secondary DoTs cannot stack with each other.

trait.name: Taking Advantage
trait.description: After Parrying or Partially Parrying, you heal a small amount of Morale and your Gambit Builders cost no Power for 5s.

trait.name: One After Another
trait.description: Minor victories in battle hearten you.

specialEffect.label: Defeating an enemy causes you to restore 5% of your max Morale

trait.name: Shield Tactics
trait.tooltip: Clever use of the shield greatly increases your Tactical Mitigation.
trait.description: Clever use of the shield greatly increases your Tactical Mitigation.

trait.name: Shield Mastery
trait.tooltip: Master your use of the shield.
trait.description: Grants access to Shield Mastery, a skill which enhances your avoidances.

trait.name: Exultation of Battle
trait.description: Your Morale-taps last longer.

stat.name: Trait_PulseCount_Warden_Lifetap
stat.descriptionOverride: +2 Pulses to area of effect Morale-taps

trait.name: Endurance Training
trait.description: Exercising your throwing arm prevents you from wearing out during battle.

specialEffect.label: All Gambit Builders now perform a Morale-tap on the enemy.

trait.name: Makeshift Caltrops
trait.description: Improved Hampering Javelin now slows enemies around your target.

specialEffect.label: Hampering Javelin now slows up to 5 enemies around the target

trait.name: Focus Fire
trait.description: You excel at marking priority targets for your fellows.

stat.name: Skill_Warden_Marked_Target
stat.descriptionOverride: Marked Target removes an additional ${PERCENTVALUE} Physical Mitigation

stat.name: Skill_Warden_Diminished_Target
stat.descriptionOverride: Diminished Target removes an additional ${PERCENTVALUE} Tactical Mitigation

trait.name: Throwing Arm
trait.description: A strong throwing arm puts more power behind your Javelins.

trait.name: Elegant Finish
trait.description: You gain a swath of unique bonuses to your Buff chain finishers.

stat.name: Skill_Warden_Flourish_Phys
stat.descriptionOverride: Dance of War grants a ${PERCENTVALUE} Physical Mitigation buff

stat.name: Skill_Warden_Flourish_Tac
stat.descriptionOverride: Conviction grants a ${PERCENTVALUE} Tactical Mitigation buff

stat.name: Skill_Warden_WarCry_Finish_Buff
stat.descriptionOverride: Surety of Death grants ${VALUE} Block and Parry Rating

stat.name: Skill_Warden_Persevere_Finish_Buff
stat.descriptionOverride: Celebration of Skill grants a +${PERCENTVALUE} Incoming Healing buff

specialEffect.label: Restoration now grants an Instant Heal
Desolation now has a chance to inflict fear upon foes
Dodging an attack brings a moment of relief, restoring 1% of your maximum Morale.

trait.name: The Deadly Storm
trait.description: Uses a wide array of AoE attacks, inflicting whirling damage upon many foes at once.

trait.name: The Bowmaster
trait.description: A stationary, high-impact line that rains bursts of damage upon the assailant, using a rhythm of generating and consuming Focus to maximize DPS.

stat.name: Skill_RangedAttack_MaxRangeMod
stat.descriptionOverride: +${VALUE} max distance for all ranged skills

trait.name: The Martial Champion
trait.description: A warrior line, forgoing the shield for better weapons. Managing Fervour, health, and power makes this Tank unstoppable.

stat.name: ForwardSource_Combat_Block_PrimarySlot_EquipmentCategory
stat.descriptionOverride: You may block with a two-handed weapon.

trait.name: Lead the Charge
trait.description: Lead the Charge Captains inflict heavy damage to their foes while enhancing their allies' prowess.

specialEffect.label:
Sure Strike has a chance to bestow Relentless Attack to the Fellowship when used while Battle-readied.
Relentless Attack: Critical Rating Physical Mastery Tactical Mastery +5% Outgoing Healing Duration: 30s
Scoring a Critical Hit causes your target to take 2% more damage for 10s. This effect stacks with Telling Mark and Oathbreaker's Shame.

trait.name: The Huntsman
trait.description: A mid-ranged mobile harasser who deals sustained damage while free to move. They unload rapid volleys, dealing damage quickly.

stat.name: Skill_ChanceMovingHit_Set_Hunter_Mod
stat.descriptionOverride: No Miss Chance Penalty for Movement.

specialEffect.label: Induction based attacks can be used while moving.

trait.name: The Fighter of Shadow
trait.description: Excels at debuffing enemies, gaining survivability by making their enemies weaker. Guardians may Tank with a 2-handed weapon to inflict higher damage.

trait.name: Assailment
trait.description: A ranged support line that debuffs enemies while dealing significant damage from afar, useful when fighting either alone or in a Fellowship.

specialEffect.label:
Gain the skill: Improved Hampering Javelin.
Gambit Builders build a stacking ranged damage buff - max of 4.5%.
Individual Gambit Bonuses (10% Chance to Apply): Javelin: -5% Fellowship Attack Duration Fist: +5% Chance to Crit with Ranged Attacks Shield: +10% Morale return for fellows when they strike the target

trait.name: The Trapper of Foes
trait.description: Focuses on sustained damage, AoE, and CC, controlling the flow of battle while providing buffs for allies to gain leverage on their opponents.

specialEffect.label: All Traps can be used while moving and have no inductions.

trait.name: The Watcher of Resolve
trait.description: Powerful healers, offering buffs to healing potency and frequency. These Minstrels heal the Morale of the Fellowship and themselves.

trait.name: The Keeper of Animals
trait.description: Animal companions ensure their keeper's survival, using bonuses and pet-master interactions to help both thrive in battle.

specialEffect.label: Your companions have the following bonuses: +5% Morale +5% Power +2% Attack Speed +2% Outgoing Damage +1% Critical Chance +2% Block Chance +2% Parry Chance +2% Evade Chance +1 Stealth +1 Stealth Detection{{keepspaces}}
Coordination: When your animal companion lands a critical strike, your next skill has no induction. This effect cannot trigger more than once every 10s.

trait.name: Determination
trait.description: A tanking build which boosts defences while healing, able to survive attacks from many foes at once.

stat.name: Skill_Warden_MoraleTapDamage
stat.descriptionOverride:
Gambit Builders build a stacking Partial Block, Parry, and Evade buff -max of 6%.
Individual Gambit Bonuses (10% Chance to Apply): Spear: +5% Incoming Healing Modifier Fist: -2% Outgoing Damage on Target Shield: +Block Rating

trait.name: The Warrior-skald
trait.description: The damage line for Minstrels, inflicting heavy damage and moving quickly through battles.

trait.name: Benedictions of Peace
trait.description: Powerful healers, using Heal-over-time skills to sustain the Fellowship's health, able to redirect or absorb attacks flung at their allies.

trait.name: Solitary Thunder
trait.description: A mobile, burst-damage line, with a number of instant-cast and potent skills to increase DPS.

trait.name: The Mischief-maker
trait.description: Mischief-maker Burglars control fights by tricking their foes into submission.

specialEffect.label: Subtle Stab reduces the active cooldown of Trick Removals.

trait.name: The Defender of the Free
trait.description: The true Tanking build, using both AoE and single-target taunts. The primary focus is protection and survival.

specialEffect.label: Your shield skills have a 25% chance to apply a fortification effect that will increase your mitigations by 1%. This effect may stack up to five times.

trait.name: The Quiet Knife
trait.description: Quiet Knife Burglars pounce on their enemy from the shadows, dealing large amounts of damage on their opening attack.

trait.name: The Protector of Song
trait.description: Supports allies with powerful buffs, using enhanced Anthem skills with great effectiveness.

trait.name: Hands of Healing
trait.description: Hands of Healing Captains restore the morale of their allies by fighting on the front lines.

specialEffect.label:
Sure Strike has a chance to bestow Focus to the Fellowship when used while Battle-readied.
Focus: Restore 2% Max Morale over 10s Gain the following for 30s: -5% Attack Duration +5% Incoming Healing +2% Tactical Mitigation

trait.name: Cleansing Flames
trait.description: Uses long-range, induction-based attacks that deal damage-over-time for sustained high DPS.

trait.name: Recklessness
trait.description: A powerful damaging build that stacks single-target bleeds with the potential for sweeping AoE blows.

specialEffect.label:
Gambit Builders build a stacking melee damage buff - max of 6%.
Individual Gambit Bonuses (10% Chance to Apply): Spear: +5% Light DoT Damage Fist: +5% Fist Gambit Critical Damage Shield: +2% Morale-tap damage

trait.name: Leader of Men
trait.description: Leader of Men Captains shield their allies from harm and make them more resilient.

specialEffect.label:
Sure Strike has a chance to bestow On Guard to the Fellowship when used while Battle-readied.
On Guard: +5% Damage Reduction -10% Power Costs Parry Rating Duration:30s
Partial Blocks, Parries and Evades grant the Captain a Defeat Event

trait.name: The Keen Blade
trait.description: Focuses on dealing damage. Skills have high base damage, bleeds, and powerful finishing skills.

trait.name: The Berserker
trait.description: Deals bursts of single-target high damage, relying on a high Crit chance to do massive damage.

specialEffect.label: This effect can stack up to five times.

trait.name: The Ancient Master
trait.description: A CC build with a wide range of debuffs and Power-restoring abilities for the Fellowship, using chains of harmful skills to enhance debuffs.

specialEffect.label: Insult to Injury: Burning Embers will deal bonus damage to Stunned Targets

trait.name: The Gambler
trait.description: Gambler Burglars rely on the roll of the dice to inflict damage and influence outcomes.

specialEffect.label: Your Crit Chain now unlocks on Evades

trait.name: Master of Nature's Fury
trait.description: A DPS build focused on dealing significant damage from a distance. Skills interact to maximize damage to one or multiple targets.

specialEffect.label:
+20% Chance for Lightning Strike to strike twice.
Your feline companions have increased attack damage and slightly increased Morale and Power.

trait.name: Manifested Ire
trait.tooltip: Enemies are snared if they fail to continue attacking the Guardian.
trait.description: Enemies are snared if they fail to continue attacking the Guardian after their use of damaging abilites.

trait.name: Incapacitation
trait.tooltip: The potency of all non-damaging debuffs is increased by 100% on your marked target.
trait.description: The potency of all non-damaging debuffs is increased by 100% on your marked target.

trait.name: Adaptability
trait.tooltip: Whenever you are hit by an attack, your block and parry ratings will increase. This effect can stack up to 3 times and will last for 10s or until a response skill is used.
trait.description:
Whenever you are hit by an attack, your block and parry ratings will increase.
This effect can stack up to 3 times and will last for 20s or until a response skill is used.

trait.name: Mark of Permanence
trait.tooltip: Non-damaging debuffs applied to a target marked by Take to Heart become permanent in duration.
trait.description: Non-damaging debuffs applied to a target marked by Take to Heart become permanent in duration.

trait.name: Light-touched
trait.tooltip:
This trait enhances your melee damage, and incoming healing.
You will also be able to block with 2-handed weapons.
trait.description:
This trait enhances your melee damage, and incoming healing.
You will also be able to block with 2-handed weapons.

stat.name: ForwardSource_Combat_Block_PrimarySlot_EquipmentCategory
stat.descriptionOverride: You may block with a two-handed weapon.

trait.name: Valorous Strength
trait.tooltip: This trait enhances your melee and critical damage.
trait.description: This trait enhances your melee and critical damage.

trait.name: Guardian's Defence
trait.tooltip: This trait enhances your armour, critical defence, block chance and mitigation, and reduces shield wear from hits
trait.description: This trait enhances your armour, critical defence, block chance and mitigation, and reduces shield wear while blocking

trait.name: Heavy Blows
trait.tooltip: This trait further increases your melee damage and critical damage multiplier.
trait.description: This trait further increases your melee damage and critical damage multiplier.

trait.name: Disabling Strikes
trait.tooltip: The potency of all non-damaging debuffs is increased by 50%
trait.description: The potency of all non-damaging debuffs is increased by 50%

trait.name: Bolstering Blocks
trait.tooltip: Blocking attacks will restore a small amount of morale.
trait.description: Blocking attacks will restore a small amount of morale.

trait.name: Prey on the Weak
trait.tooltip: Critical hits against an opponent suffering from a Brutal Wound will restore some of your power.
trait.description: Critical hits against an opponent suffering from a Slashing Wound will inflict additional damage.

trait.name: Shield the People
trait.tooltip: Your shield skills are twice as likely to provide you with a Fortification buff. At five stacks, you will provide a fellowship-wide mitigation buff.
trait.description: Your shield skills are twice as likely to provide you with a Fortification buff. At five stacks, you will provide a fellowship-wide mitigation buff.

trait.name: Reactive Parry
trait.tooltip: Parrying attacks will cause a small amount of damage to your enemies.
trait.description: Parrying attacks will cause a small amount of damage to your enemies.

trait.name: Protection
trait.tooltip: Allows you to increase your ally's defensive stats while gaining any parries or blocks that they make .
trait.description: You may protect one of your allies, improving his defence. You will also be able to react to attacks made against him if you are within 10m.

trait.name: Protection by the Sword
trait.tooltip: You may enhance your fellowship members, improving their physical mastery and parry. You will also be able to react to attacks that an ally parries if you are within 10m.
trait.description: You may enhance your fellowship members, improving their physical mastery and parry. You will also be able to react to attacks that an ally parries if you are within 10m.

trait.name: Shield Wall
trait.tooltip: Protects an ally by intercepting all incoming damage.
trait.description: Protects an ally by intercepting all incoming damage.

trait.name: Readied Blade
trait.description: Shadow's Lament triggers a Battle-ready Event.

specialEffect.label: Shadow's Lament grants Battle-ready

trait.name: Inspiriting Presence
trait.description:
Critical heals with Inspire and Valiant Strike grant you and your Song-brother guaranteed Critical Hits with Tactical skills for the next 10s.
Inspire's healing is enhanced based on the tier of your Gallant Display buff. When Inspire is used, the Gallant Display buff will be consumed.

specialEffect.label:
Critical heals with Inspire and Valiant Strike grant you and your Song-brother guaranteed Critical Hits with Tactical skills for the next 10s.
This bonus cannot be triggered more than once every 30s.
Inspire's healing is enhanced by Gallant Display. Using inspire removes the Gallant Display buff

trait.name: Elendil's Favour
trait.description: Blade of Elendil makes your next Valiant Strike heal for more.

specialEffect.label: Blade of Elendil causes your next Valiant Strike to heal for 20% more

trait.name: Blessing of the Song
trait.description: You gain the benefits of your Song-brother skills.

specialEffect.label: You gain the benefits of your Song-brother skills

trait.tooltip: Unlocks the Blade-brother's Call skill.
trait.description: Unlocks the Blade-brother's Call skill.

specialEffect.label: Sure Strike grants an Armour buff

trait.description: Blade of Elendil causes the next attack against you to deal less damage.

specialEffect.label: Blade of Elendil causes the next attack against you to deal 20% less damage

trait.name: Blessing of the Blade
trait.description: You gain the benefits of your Blade-brother skills.

specialEffect.label: You gain the benefits of your Blade-brother skills

trait.name: Exemplar
trait.description:
When you or your Shield-brother is attacked, both have a chance to be healed.
Critical and Devastating Hits against you or your Shield-brother reduce the cooldown of Shield of the Dnedain and Strength in Numbers.

specialEffect.label: When you or your Shield-brother is attacked, both have a chance to be healed

Critical Hits against you or your Shield-brother reduce the cooldown of Strength in Numbers by 1s and Shield of the Dnedain by 2s
These effects can only occur once every 8 seconds per brother.

trait.name: Song-brother's Call

trait.tooltip: Unlocks the Last Stand skill.
trait.description: Unlocks the Last Stand skill.

specialEffect.label: You gain the benefits of your Shield-brother skills

trait.description:
Critical Hits with Inspire and Shadow's Lament cause you and your Blade-brother's next Melee or Ranged Skill to Crit.
Banner of War causes a stacking Critical Rating buff to allies within its effect for each skillplay they perform.

specialEffect.label: Critical Hits with Inspire and Shadow's Lament cause you and your Blade-brother's next Melee or Ranged Skill to Crit

specialEffect.label: Grave Wound will apply a bleed to targets in a small area when your Cutting Attack bleed is present

trait.description: Hits with any strike skill decreases the Champion's attack duration. In addition, critical strikes generate an additional point of fervour. These effects have a chance to be triggered per hit of a skill.

trait.name: Adamant

trait.description: Reduces incoming damage for a short duration. The amount of damage reduced is dependant on how many pips of fervour is consumed

trait.description: For each 5% of health the Champion is missing, his damage is increased while Adamant is active.

trait.name: Born For Combat
trait.tooltip: Each time you are struck by an enemy, you gain a stack of Born for Combat. At 10 stacks, you gain a powerful AoE skill that damages foes all around you.
trait.description: Each time you are struck by an enemy, you gain a stack of Born for Combat. At 10 stacks, you gain a powerful AoE skill that damages foes all around you.

trait.name: Fire at Will

trait.description: You call for your fellowship to rain attacks down upon your enemies, granting them bonuses to their damage.

trait.name: A Small Snag
trait.tooltip: Sometimes we just get caught up on the little things in life. You make sure this tends to happen more often than not.
trait.description: Sometimes we just get caught up on the little things in life. You make sure this tends to happen more often than not.

Blood Rage becomes Continuous Blood Rage.

This skill also restores max fervour.

trait.name: Tutelage of the Brown Wizard

trait.name: Tale of Tales
trait.description: Grants access to Tale of Tales, a powerful Aura which carries different buffs based on what stance you are in.

trait.name: Song of Restoration
trait.description: Story of Courage is now a targeted skill, and will remove an additional Poison, Disease, Wound, or Fear in an area around your target.

trait.name: Ascendant Anthem of the Third Age
trait.description: Further increases the bonuses offered by Anthem of the Third Age - Melody

stat.descriptionOverride: Damage bonus from Anthem of the Third Age - Melody increased by +${PERCENTVALUE}

trait.name: Resonant Ballads
trait.description: All Ballads increase Outgoing Healing by an extra 3%.

trait.name: Rally!
trait.tooltip: The ways of the elder age are not lost to all races yet, you may bring new inspiration to those whose morale has been entirely depleted, reviving a defeated target in combat.
trait.description: The ways of the elder ages are not lost to all races yet. You may bring new inspiration to those whose Morale has been entirely depleted, reviving a defeated ally in combat.

trait.name: Resolute
trait.description: Protect yourself so that you may protect others.

trait.name: Bolster Our Courage
trait.description: A portion of Bolster Courage's heal is also applied to nearby Fellows.

trait.name: Song of Aid
trait.tooltip: Grants access to Song of Aid
trait.description: Grants access to Song of Aid, which gives each member of your fellowship a unique buff based on their class.

trait.name: Killstreak Skill Target Count
trait.description: Increases the number of targets hit by your Killstreak skills.

trait.name: Bleed Them Dry
trait.tooltip: All Guardian bleeds have an extended duration.
trait.description: All Guardian bleeds have an extended duration.

trait.name: Call to Ioreth
trait.tooltip: Grants access to Call to Ioreth
trait.description: Grants access to Call to Ioreth, which causes your next heal to be a critical heal.

trait.name: Smashing Stab
trait.description: Earns the skill: Smashing Stab.

trait.name: Follow Through
trait.description: The Shield-smash skill can now hit multiple targets, and its range is slightly extended.

trait.name: Stoic
trait.description:
Your Warrior's Heart skill has a chance to apply a damage bubble on use.
At rank 6 the bubble's potency is increased, and it provides a damage reduction effect.

trait.name: Guardian's Ward: Tactics
trait.description: Guardian's Ward will now provide additional Tactical Mitigation with each rank.

trait.name: Challenge the Darkness
trait.tooltip: Your Challenge skill will affect additional targets and cast Guardian's Ward when used.
trait.description: Your Challenge skill will affect additional targets and cast Guardian's Ward when used.

trait.name: Strengthen the Bulwark
trait.tooltip: Your fortification buff will provide additional damage mitigation per stack. Your critical hits with shield skills will also automatically apply a stack of fortification.
trait.description:
Your fortification buff will provide additional damage mitigation per stack.
Your critical hits with shield skills will also automatically apply a stack of fortification.

trait.name: Rousing Words
trait.tooltip: A channelled skill that heals Morale with every second.
trait.description: A channelled skill that heals Morale with every second.

trait.name: Essay of Fire
trait.tooltip: Powerful damage over time skill that removes the induction of your next fire attack.
trait.description: Powerful damage over time skill that removes the induction of your next fire attack.

trait.name: Shocked
trait.description: Writ of Lightning also increases enemy inductions and attack duration.

trait.name: Strong Bursts
trait.description: Increases area of effect skill damage.

trait.name: Numbed Senses
trait.description: Ignore the Pain will remove additional debuffs.

trait.name: Radiate
trait.description: Your damaging area of effect skills have a chance to transfer your debuffs to additional targets.

trait.name: Lesser Giant Eagle
trait.description: Earns the skill: Eagle-friend.

trait.name: Insult to Injury
trait.description: Your damaging attacks have a chance to renew all debuffs on your target.

trait.name: Flash of Light
trait.tooltip: Attacks against marked targets will deal light damage to nearby targets.
trait.description: Attacks against marked targets will deal Light damage to nearby targets.

trait.name: Overwhelming Odds
trait.description: Completing a Fellowship Manoeuvre will empower the burglar, based on what Manoeuvre was completed.

specialEffect.label:
Strength: +10% Melee Damage
Tactics: -10% Skill Power Cost
Conviction: +10% Gamble Damage
Guile: +5 Pulses for Cunning Attack and Gambler's Advantage

trait.name: Disabling Attack
trait.description: You are able to use your Disable skill to greatly reduce your enemy's speed.

trait.name: Little Annoyances
trait.description: You know how to make those little things really distract people. Small Snag becomes Quite a Snag, which has increased range, a more potent debuff, and no longer requires Double-edged Strike to be used first.

specialEffect.label: A Small Snag becomes Quite a Snag

trait.name: Improved Sneak
trait.description:
When using Surprise Strike or Cunning Attack from Sneak they are now guaranteed to be Critical Hits.
<rgb=#DD2121>Note: This does not affect Feint Attack or Improved Feint Attack.</rgb>

trait.name: Practiced Bluff
trait.description: Your ability to bluff an attack through has been well-practiced. Feint Attack becomes Improved Feint Attack and now activates more stealth skills. Your damage from Stealth attacks, including Improved Feint, is also increased.

specialEffect.label: Feint Attack becomes Improved Feint Attack

trait.name: Dealings Done
trait.description: You know what to do with the cards you are dealt. Lucky Strike becomes Gambler's Strike, which has a reduced cooldown and no longer requires Double-edged Strike.

specialEffect.label: Lucky Strike becomes Gambler's Strike

trait.name: Vanguard Rank 5
trait.tooltip: Unlocks the Piercing Roar Killstreak skill, the Fleetness Recruit Defeat effect, and a chance to refund all the Killstreak spent to trigger a Killstreak skill. Hero death effects have increased duration.
trait.description: Unlocks the Piercing Roar Killstreak skill, the Fleetness Recruit Defeat effect, and a chance to refund all the Killstreak spent to trigger a Killstreak skill. Hero death effects have increased duration.

stat.name: BigBattle_Vanguard_HeroesDeath_Mod_Duration
stat.descriptionOverride: Increased duration on hero death effects.

specialEffect.label: Incite Foes causes damage.

trait.name: Officer Rank 2
trait.tooltip: Unlocks the ability to order Target Priority - Warriors, Target Priority - Archers, and to deploy Engineer and Vanguard Banners.
trait.description: Unlocks the ability to order Target Priority - Warriors, Target Priority - Archers, and to deploy Engineer and Vanguard Banners.

trait.name: Engineer Rank 5
trait.tooltip: Unlocks the ability to load triple catapult shells, upgrade the damage of siege weapons, and to apply a slow powder to catapult shells.
trait.description: Unlocks the ability to load triple catapult shells, upgrade the damage of siege weapons, and to apply a slow powder to catapult shells.

trait.name: Vanguard Rank 4
trait.tooltip: Unlocks the Galvanizing Defeat Hero's Death effect, the Rejuvenation Soldier Defeat Effect, and a chance to refund half the Killstreak spent to trigger a Killstreak skill. Hero death effects have increased duration.
trait.description: Unlocks the Galvanizing Defeat Hero's Death effect, the Rejuvenation Soldier Defeat Effect, and a chance to refund half the Killstreak spent to trigger a Killstreak skill. Hero death effects have increased duration.

stat.name: BigBattle_Vanguard_HeroesDeath_Mod_Duration
stat.descriptionOverride: Increased duration on hero death effects.

trait.name: Engineer Rank 4
trait.tooltip: Unlocks the ability to load grapeshot catapult shells, to apply the Leeching Powder to catapult shells, and grants a 15% contribution boost to all interactions.
trait.description: Unlocks the ability to load grapeshot catapult shells, to apply the Leeching Powder to catapult shells, and grants a 15% contribution boost to all interactions.

trait.name: Officer Rank 3
trait.tooltip: Unlocks the ability to order Two-handed Stance, Target Priority - Sapper, Target Priority - Berserker, and a moderate increase to the initial heal provided by your Heal Order.
trait.description: Unlocks the ability to order Two-handed Stance, Target Priority - Sapper, Target Priority - Berserker, and a moderate increase to the initial heal provided by your Heal Order.

trait.name: Vanguard Rank 3
trait.tooltip: Unlocks the Enfeebling Cry Killstreak skill, the Motivating Fall Hero's Death effect, and the Serrated Recruit Defeat Effect. Hero death effects have increased duration.
trait.description: Unlocks the Enfeebling Cry Killstreak skill, the Motivating Fall Hero's Death effect, and the Serrated Recruit Defeat Effect. Hero death effects have increased duration.

stat.name: BigBattle_Vanguard_HeroesDeath_Mod_Duration
stat.descriptionOverride: Increased duration on hero death effects.

specialEffect.label: Incite Foe affects several targets.

trait.name: Vanguard Rank 6
trait.tooltip: Unlocks the Stunning Bellow Killstreak skill, the Inspiring End Hero's Death effect, the Entrenchment Soldier Defeat effect, and increases the area of all Killstreak skills and Hero's Death effects. Hero death effects have increased duration.
trait.description: Unlocks the Stunning Bellow Killstreak skill, the Inspiring End Hero's Death effect, the Entrenchment Soldier Defeat effect, and increases the area of all Killstreak skills and Hero's Death effects. Hero death effects have increased duration.

stat.name: BigBattle_Vanguard_HeroesDeath_Mod_Duration
stat.descriptionOverride: Increased duration on hero death effects.

trait.name: Officer Rank 4
trait.tooltip: Unlocks the ability to order Target Priority - Commander, increase the range you can deploy your banners, and increases the duration of your heal, haste, armour and damage orders by five seconds.
trait.description: Unlocks the ability to order Target Priority - Commander, increase the range you can deploy your banners, and increases the duration of your heal, haste, armour and damage orders by five seconds.

trait.name: Vanguard Rank 2
trait.tooltip: Unlocks the Stimulating Loss Hero's Death effect, and the Eye for an Eye Soldier Defeat Effect.
trait.description: Unlocks the Stimulating Loss Hero's Death effect, and the Eye for an Eye Soldier Defeat Effect.

specialEffect.label: Allies will not attack your target when using Incite Foe

trait.name: Engineer Rank 3
trait.tooltip: Unlocks the ability to utilize placeable catapults and ballistas, upgrade the crank speed of siege weapons, and to apply the demoralizing powder to catapult shells.
trait.description: Unlocks the ability to utilize placeable catapults and ballistas, upgrade the crank speed of siege weapons, and to apply the demoralizing powder to catapult shells.

trait.name: Engineer Rank 6
trait.tooltip: Unlocks the ability to load spread catapult shells, upgrade the distance of siege weapons, apply the rending powder to catapult shells, and grants a 30% contribution boost to all interactions.
trait.description: Unlocks the ability to load spread catapult shells, upgrade the distance of siege weapons, apply the rending powder to catapult shells, and grants a 30% contribution boost to all interactions.

trait.name: Officer Rank 5
trait.tooltip: Unlocks an increase of the area your banners benefit, adds a heal to your Corruption Removal, and increases the duration of your heal, haste, armour and damage orders by ten seconds.
trait.description: Unlocks an increase of the area your banners benefit, adds a heal to your Corruption Removal, and increases the duration of your heal, haste, armour and damage orders by ten seconds.

stat.name: BigBattle_Officer_Passive_Corruption_Heal
stat.descriptionOverride: Remove Corruption Order will also heal squad

trait.name: Engineer Rank 2
trait.tooltip: Unlocks the ability to load heavy catapult shells, and grants a 5% contribution boost to all interactions.
trait.description: Unlocks the ability to load heavy catapult shells, and grants a 5% contribution boost to all interactions.

trait.name: Vanguard Rank 1
trait.tooltip: Unlocks the Demoralizing Shout Killstreak skill, and the Invigoration Recruit Defeat Effect.
trait.description: Unlocks the Demoralizing Shout Killstreak skill, and the Invigoration Recruit Defeat Effect.

trait.name: Officer Rank 1
trait.tooltip: Unlocks the ability to order Shield Stance, Siege Armour, and Arrow Volley Armour.
trait.description: Unlocks the ability to order Shield Stance, Siege Armour, and Arrow Volley Armour.

trait.name: Engineer Rank 1
trait.tooltip: Unlocks the ability to utilize placeable barricades, place traps, and upgrade armour on siege weapons.
trait.description: Unlocks the ability to utilize placeable barricades, place traps, and upgrade armour on siege weapons.

trait.name: Officer Rank 6
trait.tooltip: Unlocks a substantial increase to the initial heal provided by your Heal Order, adds an initial heal to your banner deployment, and increases the duration of your heal, haste, armour and damage orders by twenty seconds.
trait.description: Unlocks a substantial increase to the initial heal provided by your Heal Order, adds an initial heal to your banner deployment, and increases the duration of your heal, haste, armour and damage orders by twenty seconds.

trait.name: Arrow Volley Armour Order Strength
trait.description: Increases the potency of your arrow volley order.

trait.name: Siege Armour Order Strength
trait.description: Increases the potency of your siege armour order.

trait.name: Raise Our Spirits
trait.description: Raise the Spirit provides a fellowship-wide AoE heal.

trait.name: Emboldening Finish
trait.description:
Ballads have a chance to build a stacking enhancement for Coda of Dissonance.
Each stack will cause Coda of Dissonance to add a +5% damage buff, up to 25%.

trait.name: Inspiring Finish
trait.description:
Ballads have a chance to build a stacking enhancement for Coda of Resonance.
Each stack will cause Coda of Resonance to add 3% Outgoing Healing, up to 15%.

trait.name: Snap Shot
trait.tooltip: Gambit Builders have a chance of triggering the ability to use one of your Javelin Skills, even if it is on cooldown. You cannot gain this effect more than once every 20s.
trait.description: Gambit Builders have a chance of triggering the ability to use one of your Javelin Skills, even if it is on cooldown. You cannot gain this effect more than once every 20s.

skill.name: Snap Shot - Javelin of Deadly Force

trait.name: Dodge This!
trait.tooltip: The enemy cannot avoid you forever.
trait.description: When an enemy avoids an attack, you gain access to an unavoidable Javelin skill.

specialEffect.label: If an enemy dodges one of your attacks, you gain access to a quick Javelin skill which cannot be avoided.

trait.name: Vanguard Banner Strength
trait.description: Increases the benefit provided by your vanguard banner.

trait.name: Engineer Banner Strength
trait.description: Increases the benefit provided by your engineer banner.

trait.name: Banner Cooldown
trait.description: Reduces the cooldown of your banner skills.

trait.name: Banner Duration
trait.description: Increases the duration of your banners.

trait.name: Armour Orc-craft
trait.description: Reduces the amount of damage you take from Orc-craft sources, specifically enemy arrow volleys.

trait.name: Armour Fellwrought
trait.description: Reduces the amount of damage you take from Fell-wrought sources, specifically enemy siege weaponry.

trait.name: Tripwire Trap Duration
trait.description: Increases the knockdown duration of your tripwire traps.

trait.name: Place Trap Cooldown
trait.description: Reduces the cooldown on your trap placement skills.

trait.name: Caltrop Trap Damage
trait.description: Increases the damage done by your caltrop traps.

trait.name: Trap Triggercount
trait.description: Increases the number of times your traps may be triggered by the enemy.

trait.name: Trap Debuff Strength
trait.description: Increases the amount of incoming damage taken by any monster attacked triggering one of your traps and receiving the <rgb=#99FF33>Unguarded</rgb> effect.

trait.name: Bear Trap Damage
trait.description: Increases the damage done by your bear traps.

trait.name: Snowball
trait.tooltip: Healing skills will build to a potent finish.
trait.description: Healing skills build a stacking buff. At maximum stack, you can use a powerful heal

specialEffect.label: Healing skills will build a stacking effect on the Minstrel. At 7 stacks, the potent healing skill Perfect Ending will be made available for use for a short time.

trait.name: Purify Corruption
trait.description: Your Strike skills and Echoes of Battle skills will remove a corruption effect from a foe.

trait.name: Friend of Ravens
trait.description: You may summon a raven to your side.

trait.name: Friend of Sabre-cats
trait.description: You may summon a sabre-tooth to your side.

trait.name: Friend of Nature
trait.description: You may summon a Spirit of Nature to your side.

trait.name: Friend of Lynx
trait.description: You may summon a lynx to your side.

trait.name: Friend of Bog-guardians
trait.description: You may summon a bog-guardian to your side.

trait.name: Friend of Bears
trait.description: You may summon a bear to your side.

trait.name: Brutal Strikes
trait.description: Earns the skill: Brutal Strikes.

trait.name: Blade Damage
trait.description: Increases Blade skill damage.

trait.name: Broad Sweep
trait.description:
Increases the number of Targets for Area Effect Skills.
At max rank, Swift Strike becomes Swift Blade.

trait.name: Concussive Shout
trait.description: Critical Hits with Piercing Cry will stun the target for 5s.

trait.name: Heart Seeker
trait.description: First rank unlocks the Skill Heart Seeker. Second rank increases the duration of the Heartseeker DoT.

trait.name: Swift and True
trait.description: Increases Swift Bow's damage per rank. Max rank gives Quick Shot a chance to reduce the induction of Swift Bow.

trait.name: Perseverance
trait.description: Increases the Power and Morale gain of Press Onward.

trait.name: Press Onward
trait.description: Earns the skill: Press Onward.

trait.name: Tripwire
trait.description: Earns the skill: Tripwire.

trait.name: Word Spreads
trait.description: Each rank increases the amount of maximum targets for Gift of the Hammerhand by 1.

trait.name: Perfect Performance
trait.description: Your ballads provide a portion of their bonuses to your fellowship.

stat.name: Skill_Minstrel_Perfect_Performance_String

trait.name: Enough for Everyone
trait.tooltip: Grants the Skill: Share the Power - Fellowship
trait.description: Grants the Skill: Share the Power - Fellowship

trait.name: Rapid Fire
trait.description: Reduces Induction Duration

trait.name: Caparison of Odogil
trait.description: A festive caparison which bears seven bright stars against the night's sky.

trait.name: Emote: Chicken Putt
trait.tooltip: You have learned the chicken putt emote (/chickenputt).
trait.description: You have learned the chicken putt emote (/chickenputt).

trait.name: Emote: Chicken Chip
trait.tooltip: You have learned the chicken chip emote (/chickenchip).
trait.description: You have learned the chicken chip emote (/chickenchip).

trait.name: Emote: Chicken Drive
trait.tooltip: You have learned the chicken drive emote (/chickendrive).
trait.description: You have learned the chicken drive emote (/chickendrive).

trait.name: Dol Amroth - Vendor Discount
trait.tooltip: This provides players with a discount with all West Gondor vendors.
trait.description: You receive a discount from all West Gondor vendors.

trait.name: Dol Amroth - Travel Discount
trait.tooltip: This gives the player a 10% discount from all West Gondor stable-masters.
trait.description: You receive a discount from all West Gondor stable-masters.

trait.name: Emote: Drink From the Boot
trait.tooltip: You have learned the drink from the boot emote (/drinkboot).
trait.description: You have learned the drink from the boot emote (/drinkboot).

trait.name: Emote: Throw Feathers
trait.tooltip: You have learned the throw feathers emote (/chickenfeather).
trait.description: You have learned the throw feathers emote (/chickenfeather).

trait.name: Trellis-weave Caparison
trait.description: A light caparison inspired by garden trellises of the Shire.

trait.name: Valour
trait.description: The Captain's healing skills have a 20% chance to build stacks of valour. At 5 stacks, you burst an AoE heal around yourself and your next Valiant Strike is guaranteed to crit.

trait.name: Elite Companions
trait.description: You give your companions the equipment and training to damage enemy armour.

stat.name: Skill_Captain_ArmourRend_AppChance
stat.descriptionOverride: +20% Chance for Herald and Archer attacks to reduce enemy armour.

trait.name: Elendil's Fury
trait.description: Reduces the cooldown and increases the number of targets affected by Elendil's Roar.

trait.name: Bleed Damage
trait.description: Slash now applies a bleed that can stack up to three times. Additional ranks increase the potency of the bleed.

trait.name: Serrated Edge
trait.description:
Biting Edge becomes a single attack, but as a bleed over 12 seconds.
Max Rank reduces the duration of the bleed in half.

trait.name: Quick Recovery
trait.description: Increases the initial heal of Recuperate. The second rank increases the initial heal further.

trait.name: Piercing Roar
trait.description: Unlocks Piercing Roar, a single target attack that reduces your target's damage.

trait.name: Levelling Roar
trait.description: Takedown no longer deals damage, but can now be used on targets up to 10m away.

specialEffect.label: Takedown loses its damage but now can be used at ranged

trait.name: Encouraging Strike
trait.description: Striking enemies with Slash puts a stacking healing buff on yourself. Additional ranks increase the potency of the buff per stack.

trait.name: Crippling Stings
trait.description: Bee Swarm now also snares your enemies for a short duration. Additional ranks increase the potency of the snare.

trait.name: Final Strike
trait.description: Increases the damage of Execute and eliminates its health threshold requirement.

trait.name: Composure
trait.description: Hearten becomes Composure, a self only heal that heals the Beorning for a percentage of his or her Max Morale per tick.

trait.name: Imposing Presence
trait.description: Increases Grisly Cry's fear duration per rank

trait.name: In Harm's Way
trait.description: In addition to redirecting damage to the Beorning, Sacrifice also transfers some of the target's threat.

trait.name: Nature's Mend
trait.description: Unlocks the skill Nature's Mend, an induction based heal that is more potent for your marked ally.

trait.name: Stampede
trait.description: Using Rush in Bear Form applies the effect to your entire fellowship. Additional ranks increase the duration of the effect.

trait.name: Execute
trait.description: Unlocks Execute, a heavy hitting skill that expends all your Wrath to multiply damage.

trait.name: Improved Hearten
trait.description: Increases Hearten's heal per rank.

trait.name: Physical Mitigation Increase
trait.description: Increases your Physical Mitigation per rank.

trait.name: Fate
trait.description: Increases your Fate per rank.

trait.name: Melee Damage
trait.description: Increases your melee damage per rank.

trait.name: Weakening Blow
trait.description: Increases the damage of Slam per rank. Max Rank gives Slam an outgoing damage debuff.

trait.name: Lumber
trait.description: After using Rush in bear form, your next attack will knock down your target.

trait.name: Takedown
trait.description: Unlocks the skill Takedown, a bear form attack that deals minor damage and knocks a target down.

trait.name: Vitality Increase
trait.description: Increases your vitality per rank.

trait.name: Any Advantage
trait.description: Striking an enemy from behind with Slam will heal you.

trait.name: Shake Free
trait.description:
The first rank adds a 10% Morale Bubble to Shake Free. The second rank increases the potency of the bubble to 15% of Max Morale.
If Support: Shake Free applies its benefits to your marked ally.

trait.name: Tactical Mitigation Increase
trait.description: Increases your Tactical Mitigation per rank.

trait.name: Enraging Sacrifice
trait.description: Reduces the amount of damage Sacrifice redirects from your ally. Gain Wrath every time your Sacrifice target is hit.

trait.name: Sluggish Stings
trait.description: In addition to dealing damage, your bees now increase the induction duration of your target.

trait.name: Healing Increase
trait.description: Increases your Outgoing Healing per rank.

trait.name: Assertive Roar
trait.description: Ferocious Roar gains a Max Morale buff. Additional ranks increase the potency of the buff.

trait.name: Opposing Presence
trait.description: Increases the Area Effect damage of Biting Edge. Max rank causes Biting Edge to force taunt for a short duration, but at the cost of an increased cooldown.

trait.name: Turn The Tides
trait.description: Nature's Vengeance now deals damage to the target for every corruption it removes. Additional ranks increase the amount of damage you do per corruption removed.

trait.name: Rending Blows
trait.description: Unlocks the skill Rending Blow.

trait.name: Recuperate
trait.description: Unlocks the skill Recuperate, a wrath consuming heal over time.

trait.name: All On The Line
trait.description: Increases the amount of damage that Sacrifice redirects, but mitigates a percentage of the redirected damage.

trait.name: Quick Mend
trait.description: Reduces the induction of Nature's Mend and increases its healing.

trait.name: Raging Blow
trait.description:
Increases the damage of Vicious Claws.
If Support: Striking a target with Vicious Claws will give your Mark of Grimbeorn target a short duration damage buff. Additional ranks increase the potency of the buff.

trait.name: Desperate Shouts
trait.description: After using Ferocious Roar, the Wrath cost of your next healing skill is reduced. At max rank, the cost is fully removed.

trait.name: Hardened Heart
trait.description: After using Hearten, you generate additional Wrath over time. Amount per second is increased by additional ranks.

trait.name: Armour Crush
trait.description: The first rank converts Rending Blow into Armour Crush, which adds an incoming damage debuff to the skill. The second rank increases the debuff but increases the cooldown of the skill.

trait.name: Debilitating Bees
trait.description: Bee Swarm reduces the target's Physical Mitigation for its duration.

trait.name: Critical Chance
trait.description: Increases your Critical Chance per rank.

trait.name: Vigilant Roar
trait.description: Vigilant and Thunderous Roar temporarily improve incoming healing, and generate additional threat when enemies attack you. Additional ranks increase the buff's duration.

trait.name: Moment of Opportunity
trait.description: Increases the damage of Execute per rank. Max rank gives the Beorning's attacks in bear form a chance to enable Execute regardless of the target's health.

trait.name: Feral
trait.description: You are inspired by your pet companion, and take on a few of its fighting characteristics.

specialEffect.label:
Gain a unique buff based on which pet you have summoned.
Bear: +5% Max Morale, +5% Mitigation Birds: +50% Gust of Wind Damage, +5% Critical Chance Felines: -10% Induction Duration,+15% Fire DoT Damage Spirit: +15% Incoming Healing, +15% Outgoing Healing Bog-guardian: +10% Tactical Damage, +2s Stun Duration

trait.name: Crippling Roar
trait.description: Adds a snare to Piercing Roar. Additional ranks improve the snare's strength.

trait.name: Fire Shield
trait.description: Your Fire skills have a 25% chance to raise a protective shield around you, boosting your defences and reflecting Fire Damage at attackers.

specialEffect.label: You will need to wait 5s after a shield expires to trigger a new one.

trait.name: The Hide
trait.description: Relying on the bear form, this line bolsters personal defences while weakening the enemy.

trait.name: The Roar
trait.description: Using the knowledge of your unique people, aid your allies with powerful healing, debuffs, and crowd control.

trait.name: The Claw
trait.description: Empowering both Bear and Man, this line focuses on overpowering foes with devastating attacks.

trait.name: Enfeeble
trait.description: The debuff strength of the following skills are increased for the first 10s of their cast:

specialEffect.label: Ancient Craft Sign of Power: See All Ends Sign of Power: Command

trait.name: Fellowship Protector
trait.description: Your fellows are a source of strength.

specialEffect.label: Conviction will grant you a Mitigation buff that is stronger for every nearby ally.

trait.name: Cover Your Tracks
trait.description: You learn to cover your tracks, making it harder for the enemy to retaliate for your mischief.

trait.name: Sharp Eye
trait.description: Learning to spot cheats has taught you to better spot enemy attacks. Your mitigation is improved during your critical chain.

stat.name: Skill_Burglar_SharpEye_mitigationmod
stat.descriptionOverride: Gain a 2.5% mitigation buff while your critical chain is active.

trait.name: Sneak Attack
trait.description: Deal savage damage when attacking from stealth.

trait.name: Quick with a Blade
trait.description: Your refined technique allows you to take better advantage of an enemy, regardless of their health.

specialEffect.label: Merciful Strike now has no health threshold requirement

trait.name: The More The Merrier
trait.description: You grow so adept at fighting groups of enemies, you become more effective when doing so.

specialEffect.label: Blade Skills have a 15% chance to generate 1 Fervour for every target hit.

trait.name: Weapons Master
trait.description: Your extensive weapons training makes you a dangerous foe with your arms of choice.

specialEffect.label:
Dual-wielding weapons grants you: +3% chance to Parry +6% Damage
Wielding a single weapon grants you: -5% Attack Duration +15% Critical Damage

trait.name: Moving Target
trait.description: A moving target is always more difficult to hit.

stat.name: Combat_AdditiveEvadeRate_Moving
stat.descriptionOverride: Gain +5% Evade chance whilst you are moving.

trait.name: Plant Feet
trait.description: You hold your ground even under enemy fire.

stat.name: Combat_AdditiveEvadeRate_Stationary
stat.descriptionOverride:
Gain +5% to Evade Chance after standing still for 1.5s.
Moving will break this bonus until you root once more.

trait.name: Emergency Preparations
trait.description: You save a trap for when you are most threatened.

specialEffect.label:
Evading instantly place a single trap in front of you.
This trap is the same trap from Set Trap.
This effect can only take place once every 8 seconds.

trait.name: Honed Spikes
trait.description: You can improve any set of shield-spikes you come across.

stat.name: Skill_Warden_HonedSpikes_CritDamage
stat.descriptionOverride: Shield-spikes give +${PERCENTVALUE} Critical Damage to Shield Skills

trait.name: Seize the Moment
trait.description: Your Critical Hits can open up the enemy to a barrage of attacks.

specialEffect.label: Critical Hits with Javelin Gambits have a 50% chance to reset your Gambit Masteries and remove their cooldown for 10s.

trait.name: Prolonged Verse
trait.description: Increases the number of pulses of Mending Verse. Max rank lowers the induction of Mending verse.

trait.name: Overture of Hope
trait.description: Rune-keeper bubbles increase a targets incoming healing and reduces the damage they take. Words of Exaltation will also trigger the expiration heal of Bombastic Inspiration on a target if it is present.

stat.name: Trait_Runekeeper_Cashout_Magnitude
stat.descriptionOverride: Bubbles from the RK grant the target: +${PERCENTVALUE} Incoming Healing -${PERCENTVALUE} Incoming Damage

trait.name: Expedient Traveller
trait.tooltip: Grants a faster recovery time on Return To Skills and Milestone Skills.
trait.description: Return To Skill and Milestone Skill recovery times reduced by 25 minutes.

trait.name: Branded Marks
trait.description: Increases the pulses of all Fire damage over time effects.

trait.name: Hastened Determination
trait.description: Reduces the cooldown of self Motivation. At max rank, Self Motivation has no induction and can be used while moving.

trait.name: Flashing Images
trait.description: For a short duration after using Steady Hands to switch attunement, using a skill which returns you to neutral attunement will activate the Steady Hands effect again.

trait.name: Break Ranks
trait.description: Throw aside your defences to unleash punishment upon the enemy.

stat.name: MELEE_DAMAGE_PERCENTAGE
stat.descriptionOverride:
Shield-taunt will cash out maximum stacks of Fortification for a 40% group damage buff for 15s.
This effect puts Shield-taunt on a 60s cooldown when used.

trait.name: Honourable Combat
trait.description: A fair exchange brings rest to both yourself and your foe.

trait.name: Singular Focus
trait.description: Your focus allows you to target weaknesses in enemy armour, hastening their defeat. Your marked enemies are especially vulnerable.

specialEffect.label:
Scoring a Critical Hit with a Parry Response skill will lower the enemy's armour rating. This debuff is more potent against Marked enemies.
This debuff cannot be refreshed by other traits.
30s Cooldown

trait.name: Strike a Chord
trait.description: Your Ballads may be beautiful to you, but your foes would disagree.

specialEffect.label: In Melody Stance, your Ballads inflict the bonuses you gain as debuffs on the enemy.

trait.name: Inner Strength
trait.description: Your songs infuse inner strength in your allies.

stat.name: IA_Minstrel_EffectMagnitude_Bubble
stat.descriptionOverride:
Soliloquy of Spirit increases Mitigations by 1%.
All damage bubbles are 15% more effective.

trait.name: Echoes
trait.description: All damaging Cries and Calls can echo in your enemies' ears, dealing extra damage.

specialEffect.label: All damaging Cries and Calls have a 33% chance to apply a bonus DoT. This DoT may stack up to 3 times.

trait.name: Pelargir - Travel Discount
trait.tooltip: This gives the player a 10% discount from all central Gondor stable-masters.
trait.description: You receive a discount from all central Gondor stable-masters.

trait.name: Pelargir - Vendor Discount
trait.tooltip: This provides players with a discount with all Central Gondor vendors.
trait.description: You receive a discount from all Central Gondor vendors.

trait.name: Bond of Trust
trait.description: You always make time to tend to a trusted friend.

specialEffect.label: Your healing skills have a 20% chance to restore 5% of the Max Morale of the ally bearing your Mark of Grimbeorn.

trait.name: Sharpened Claws
trait.tooltip: Letting out a fierce war cry empowers you.
trait.description: Letting out a fierce war cry empowers you.

trait.name: Animalistic
trait.description: You prefer to spend your days as a bear over all else.

stat.name: Skill_Beorning_BearForm_PipCost
stat.descriptionOverride: Increases Wrath generation in bear form by ${VALUE} every 3 seconds in combat.

trait.name: Greater Swarm
trait.description: You draw on the powers of unexpected allies.

trait.name: Mark of Beorn
trait.tooltip: Mark your enemies.
trait.description: Mark your enemies.

specialEffect.label:
Mark of Beorn alters the following skills if present on the target:
Grisly Cry: Becomes an Area Effect Fear around the target.
Piercing Roar: Doubles the debuff on the target.
Vicious Claws: Lowers the target's chance to hit.

trait.name: Battle Born
trait.tooltip: Throughout your life, you defended your land from countless Orc attacks, seasoning you as a warrior.
trait.description: Throughout your life, you defended your land from countless Orc attacks, seasoning you as a warrior.

trait.name: Defensively Minded
trait.description: Your experience in the thick of battle has made you stronger.

specialEffect.label: Parrying or Evading attacks will now build stacks of the Armour buff Guarded.

trait.name: Festering Wounds
trait.tooltip: Wounds you inflict upon your enemies take longer than usual to heal.
trait.description: Wounds you inflict upon your enemies take longer than usual to heal.

trait.name: Down But Not Out
trait.description: A Beorning's ability to fight through pain is legendary.

trait.name: Brutal Energy
trait.tooltip: The faster you slay a foe, the quicker you can defeat the next.
trait.description: The faster you slay a foe, the quicker you can defeat the next.

specialEffect.label: Relentless Maul now deals its damage in half the time it did previously.

trait.name: Menacing Assault
trait.description: You ferociously swing at your opponents, forcing them to pay attention.

specialEffect.label: Increases the arc Relentless Maul hits by 30 degrees and any enemy struck is forced to attack the Beorning.

trait.name: Worthy Adversary
trait.description: Some say a Beorning's hide is stronger than some shields.

trait.name: Honey Cleanse
trait.description: Beornings are keen to the medicinal properties of honey.

specialEffect.label: After using Cleanse, your next healing skill gains +10% Critical Chance for every poison, disease, fear, or wound removed.

trait.name: Rake
trait.description: If they stop paying attention to you, they will pay for it.

specialEffect.label: May stack up to three times.

trait.name: Rejuvenating Bellow
trait.tooltip: A Beorning's roar can be as heartening to its allies as it is intimidating to its enemies.
trait.description: A Beorning's roar can be as heartening to its allies as it is intimidating to its enemies.

trait.name: Flayer of Evil
trait.tooltip: While your people in their bear form are known for their might, you appear larger and more formidable then most.
trait.description: While your people in their bear form are known for their might, you appear larger and more formidable than most.

trait.name: Guarded Attack
trait.tooltip: Offence leads to victories, but defence wins wars.
trait.description: Offence leads to victories, but defence wins wars.

trait.name: Grimbeorn's Strength
trait.description: Inspired by Grimbeorn, you learn to better aid your friends in times of need.

trait.name: Wrathful
trait.tooltip: Your wrath on the battlefield is that of legend.
trait.description: Your wrath on the battlefield is that of legend.

stat.name: Runekeeper_Attunement_CritChance_BaseMod
stat.descriptionOverride: Gain 3% Critical Chance for every 20 Wrath, up to 15% at 100 Wrath

trait.name: Aid the Assault
trait.description: Your relentless attack boosts the Morale of your allies.

trait.name: Raining Blows
trait.tooltip: You grow in strength each time you strike your foe with your claws.
trait.description: You grow in strength each time you strike your foe with your claws.

trait.name: Well-Disciplined
trait.description: Well-versed in the disciplines of Mounted Combat, you are able to derive greater benefit while riding, regardless of the situation.

trait.name: Biting Edge
trait.description: Unlocks a two strike AoE skill that costs Wrath.

trait.name: Executioner
trait.description: The Beorning is able to identify the right moment to strike a mortal blow. Your Slash attack has a chance to remove the Wrath cost of Execute.

trait.name: Deadly Nature
trait.description: The nature of the Beorning is to eliminate their prey quickly and efficiently. This allows attacks that build Wrath to generate additional damage.

trait.name: Feel My Wrath
trait.description: The Beorning is not one to be reckoned with and their Slash and Bee Swarm attacks generate additional Wrath.

trait.name: Sixth Sense
trait.description: The Beorning is in tune with his inner animal, allowing him and his allies to dodge attacks more easily.

specialEffect.label: Unlocks the skill Sixth Sense.

trait.name: Coax
trait.description: You issue forth a mighty scream taunting your enemy and coaxing them to ride alongside of you.

trait.name: Everlasting Focus
trait.description: The Beorning's tight focus allows them to apply non-damaging effects that last a little longer. This does not include Healing effects.

trait.name: Virtuous Beorning
trait.tooltip: The Virtues of Beorn are represented strongly in you.
trait.description: The Virtues of Beorn are represented strongly in you. This trait does not apply to unequipped or capped Virtues.

trait.name: Beorning Club and Axe-damage Bonus
trait.tooltip: Beorning Club and Axe Damage Bonus
trait.description: Beorning Club and Axe-damage Bonus

trait.name: Thick Hide
trait.tooltip: Increased Vitality - Beornings are thick skinned.
trait.description: Increased Vitality - Beornings are thick skinned.

trait.name: Natural Resistance
trait.tooltip: Improved Poison Resistance - Their bond with the natural world gives Beornings a natural resistance to toxins.
trait.description: Improved Poison Resistance - Their bond with the natural world gives Beornings a natural resistance to toxins.

trait.name: Might of the Wild
trait.tooltip: Increased Might - Beornings wield a ferocity unmatched by other races.
trait.description: Increased Might - Beornings wield a ferocity unmatched by other races.

trait.name: Few in Number
trait.tooltip: Reduced Fate - So few in number, Beornings' Fate is in question.
trait.description: Reduced Fate - So few in number, the Beornings' Fate is in question.

trait.name: Emissary
trait.tooltip: Your Fate is increased.
trait.description: You represent your people to the good folk of Middle-earth.

trait.name: Bake a Honey-cake
trait.tooltip: You have mastered Beorn's recipe for Honey-cakes and can make them whenever you'd like.
trait.description: You have mastered Beorn's recipe for Honey-cakes and can make them whenever you'd like.

trait.name: Might and Conviction Bonus
trait.tooltip: Might and Conviction Fellowship Bonus
trait.description: You receive a bonus to Ent's Strength and Eagle's Cry contributions.

stat.name: Skill_DamageMultiplier_Trait_Race_Conjuction_Might
stat.descriptionOverride: +5.0% to damage from Might Fellowship Skills

stat.name: Skill_HealingMultiplier_Trait_Race_Conjuction_Conviction
stat.descriptionOverride: +5.0% to morale restoration from Conviction Fellowship Skills

trait.name: Return to Grimbeorn's Lodge
trait.tooltip: This enables you to quickly return to Grimbeorn's Lodge.
trait.description: This enables you to quickly return to Grimbeorn's Lodge.

trait.name: Natural Diet
trait.tooltip: Your Disease Resistance is increased.
trait.description: Your unique diet gives you resistance to disease.

trait.name: Feral Presence
trait.tooltip: You provide a bonus to your fellowship's Fate.
trait.description: You provide a bonus to your fellowship's Fate.

trait.name: Bracing Roar
trait.tooltip: In their darkest moments, Beornings can muster a powerful roar which restores Morale and unleashes their Wrath.
trait.description: In their darkest moments, Beornings can muster a powerful roar which restores Morale and unleashes their Wrath.

trait.name: Nature's Bond
trait.description: Unlocks the skill Nature's Bond which allows you to mark an ally. When you receive healing, your marked ally also receives healing equal to 70% of the original heal.

trait.name: Thickened Hide
trait.description: Unlocks the skill Thickened Hide, which reduces all damage taken for a duration. During this time, the Beorning will heal for one percent of his or her Morale each time he or she is hit.

trait.name: Call To Wild
trait.description: Unlocks the skill Call to Wild, a buff that increases the Beorning's damage, causes pip generators to build faster, and bear form skills to cost less for a duration.

trait.name: Thrash Damage
trait.description: Increases the damage of Thrash per rank.

trait.name: Bond of Power
trait.description: The bond between rider and war-steed is one that is not easily broken. Drawing inspiration from you, your war-steed is able to hold back exhaustion and benefit from increased power regeneration.

trait.name: Deep Reserves
trait.description: Your steed is battle tested and is comfortable pushing itself to the limit, allowing it to recover more power while in and out of combat.

trait.name: Battle Tested
trait.description: No stranger to the field of battle, your war-steed fights like it feels no pain, allowing it to recover quickly while in combat.

trait.name: Rehabilitation
trait.description: War is a means to an end, but your steed finds peace when the battle is done, allowing it to recover quickly outside of combat.

trait.name: Ride for Ruin
trait.description: You fight this battle with all of your strength. Holding nothing back, your attacks have a greater chance to land a critical hit.

specialEffect.label: Unlocks the skill Ride for Ruin.

trait.name: Sacrifice
trait.description: You care deeply for your steed and are able to expend power to protect the steed from sustaining any damage for a time.

specialEffect.label: Unlocks the skill Sacrifice

trait.name: Steel Skin
trait.description: Experience has taught you when a defensive focus is necessary in battle and you have the ability to use your armour to its fullest potential.

specialEffect.label: Unlocks the skill Steel Skin.

trait.name: Bolstering Cry
trait.description: The bond between rider and war-steed is strong. Upon simply hearing your voice, your horse finds itself with a renewed endurance.

specialEffect.label: Unlocks the skill Bolstering Cry

trait.name: Positive Thinking
trait.description: Your perception is your reality and when you focus on positive results, your morale grows.

specialEffect.label: Unlocks the skill Positive Thinking

trait.name: Invigorate
trait.description: The bond between rider and war-steed is strong. Through your inspiring actions, you are able to ready your horse for battle once more.

specialEffect.label: Unlocks the skill Invigorate

trait.name: Feign Injury
trait.description: By making a momentary withdrawal from battle, you are able to re-enter with decreased aggression from the enemy.

specialEffect.label: Unlocks the skill Feign Injury

trait.name: Trample
trait.description: Your war-steed is an unstoppable force, bearing down on unmounted enemies, trampling them and leaving them in the dirt.

specialEffect.label: Unlocks the skill Trample.

trait.name: Instigate
trait.description: You know how to get under your opponents' skin and you are able to draw attention away from your weaker allies.

specialEffect.label: Unlocks the skill Instigate.

trait.name: Dash
trait.description: Your war-steed is able to sustain its short burst of speed for a longer period of time and dash over a longer distance.

specialEffect.label: Unlocks the skill Dash.

trait.name: Dash
trait.description: Even when pushed to the limit, your steed is able to dig deep and gain a burst of speed for a short time.

specialEffect.label: Unlocks the skill Dash

trait.name: Broad Thrash
trait.description: Thrash - Tier 3 now hits up to 5 enemies in front of the Beorning.

trait.name: Thunderous Roar
trait.description: Grants Thunderous Roar, allowing the Beorning to taunt all enemies within 10m.

trait.name: Overbearing
trait.description: Grants you the Overbearing skill - a version of Bear Up that can be used in combat.

trait.name: Rangers of Ithilien - Vendor Discount
trait.tooltip: This provides players with a discount with all Eastern Gondor vendors.
trait.description: You receive a discount from all Eastern Gondor vendors.

trait.name: Rangers of Ithilien - Travel Discount
trait.tooltip: This gives the player a 10% discount from all Eastern Gondor stable-masters.
trait.description: You receive a discount from all Eastern Gondor stable-masters.

trait.name: Light in the Shadow
trait.description: Your ability to go unseen becomes more potent.

trait.name: Melee Skills Range
trait.description: Your reach with melee weapons is improved.

trait.name: Melee Skills Range
trait.description: Your reach with melee weapons is improved.

trait.name: Emote: The Banner of the King
trait.tooltip: You have learned the Banner of the King emote (/bannergondor).
trait.description: You have learned the Banner of the King emote (/bannergondor).

trait.name: Morgul War-tyrant Appearance
trait.tooltip: A different visual appearance for your Uruk Warleader. A pale-skinned Uruk with glowing red eyes wearing imposing plate armour and a horned helmet painted with the Eye of Sauron.
trait.description: A different visual appearance for your Uruk Warleader. A pale-skinned Uruk with glowing red eyes wearing imposing plate armour and a horned helmet painted with the Eye of Sauron.

trait.name: Boar-tribe Chieftain Appearance
trait.tooltip: A different visual appearance for your Orc Defiler. A yellow-skinned Orc wearing a blue fur cape covered in boar ribs, blue fur leggings, and a boar skull.
trait.description: A different visual appearance for your Orc Defiler. A yellow-skinned Orc wearing a blue fur cape covered in boar ribs, blue fur leggings, and a boar skull.

trait.name: White Hand Prowler Appearance
trait.tooltip: A different visual appearance for your Warg Stalker: a grey-brown Warg.
trait.description: A different visual appearance for your Warg Stalker: a grey-brown Warg.

trait.name: Skull-painted Morgul Lieutenant Appearance
trait.tooltip: A different visual appearance for your Uruk Warleader. A pale-skinned Uruk with glowing red eyes wearing plate armour and a helmet painted with a bone-white skull.
trait.description: A different visual appearance for your Uruk Warleader. A pale-skinned Uruk with glowing red eyes wearing plate armour and a helmet painted with a bone-white skull.

trait.name: Shakh-hai Servant of Darkness Appearance
trait.tooltip: A different visual appearance for your Uruk Warleader. A red-skinned Uruk wearing purple plate mail with the White Hand of Saruman proud upon the chest and helmet.
trait.description: A different visual appearance for your Uruk Warleader. A red-skinned Uruk wearing purple plate mail with the White Hand of Saruman proud upon the chest and helmet.

trait.name: Morgul Bruiser Appearance
trait.tooltip: A different visual appearance for your Orc Reaver. A white-skinned Orc with glowing red eyes wearing scale mail.
trait.description: A different visual appearance for your Orc Reaver. A white-skinned Orc with glowing red eyes wearing scale mail.

trait.name: Shakh-hai Elite Appearance
trait.tooltip: A different visual appearance for your Uruk Blackarrow. A dark-skinned Uruk wearing chainmail, purple plate armour, and the mark of Saruman on his helmet.
trait.description: A different visual appearance for your Uruk Blackarrow. A dark-skinned Uruk wearing chainmail, purple plate armour, and the mark of Saruman on his helmet.

trait.name: Deadly Gangling Orc Appearance
trait.tooltip: A different visual appearance for your Orc Reaver. A dark-skinned lanky Orc wearing light leather armour and leggings and a mail-tunic, ornamented with wings on the shoulders. The armour is dyed brown and grey.
trait.description: A different visual appearance for your Orc Reaver. A dark-skinned lanky Orc wearing light leather armour and leggings and a mail-tunic, ornamented with wings on the shoulders. The armour is dyed brown and grey.

trait.name: Skull-painted Morgul Sniper Appearance
trait.tooltip: A different visual appearance for your Uruk Blackarrow. A pale white-skinned Uruk with glowing red eyes, shoulder armour, and a helmet painted with a bone-white skull.
trait.description: A different visual appearance for your Uruk Blackarrow. A pale white-skinned Uruk with glowing red eyes, shoulder armour, and a helmet painted with a bone-white skull.

trait.name: Scimgrit Appearance
trait.tooltip: A different visual appearance for your Spider Weaver. A light green spider first seen slaying Rohirrim in the Glittering Caves.
trait.description: A different visual appearance for your Spider Weaver. A light green spider first seen slaying Rohirrim in the Glittering Caves.

trait.name: Morgul Defiler Appearance
trait.tooltip: A different visual appearance for your Orc Defiler. A white-skinned Orc with glowing red eyes wearing the bones of dead Men and beasts.
trait.description: A different visual appearance for your Orc Defiler. A white-skinned Orc with glowing red eyes wearing the bones of dead Men and beasts.

trait.name: Morgul Sentry Appearance
trait.tooltip: A different visual appearance for your Uruk Blackarrow. A pale green-skinned Uruk with glowing red eyes and shoulder armour.
trait.description: A different visual appearance for your Uruk Blackarrow. A pale green-skinned Uruk with glowing red eyes and shoulder armour.

trait.name: Spawn of Scimgrit Appearance
trait.tooltip: A different visual appearance for your Spider Weaver. A green spider with white and brown-coloured legs and a dark green-coloured abdomen.
trait.description: A different visual appearance for your Spider Weaver. A green spider with white and brown-coloured legs and a dark green-coloured abdomen.

trait.name: Rashat-hai Defiler Appearance
trait.tooltip: A different visual appearance for your Orc Defiler. A pale grey-skinned Orc wearing a white loincloth, white, bone-like warpaint, and the gleaming white skulls of several Men.
trait.description: A different visual appearance for your Orc Defiler. A pale grey-skinned Orc wearing a white loincloth, white, bone-like warpaint, and the gleaming white skulls of several Men.

trait.name: Savage Mordor Warg Appearance
trait.tooltip: A different visual appearance for your Warg Stalker: a deep purple Warg with pale eyes covered in the scars of battle.
trait.description: A different visual appearance for your Warg Stalker: a deep purple Warg with pale eyes covered in the scars of battle.

trait.name: Pack-howler Appearance
trait.tooltip: A different visual appearance for your Warg Stalker: a brown Warg with bat-like ears.
trait.description: A different visual appearance for your Warg Stalker: a brown Warg with bat-like ears.

trait.name: Ghsh-hai Soldier Appearance
trait.tooltip: A different visual appearance for your Orc Reaver. A pale-skinned Moria Orc covered in fiery scars wearing heavy armour.
trait.description: A different visual appearance for your Orc Reaver. A pale-skinned Moria Orc covered in fiery scars wearing heavy armour.
